member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffness
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffness setting for this . muscleStiffness of masked joints. -values mean don't apply (just use defaults or ones applied by behaviours - safer if you are going to return to a behaviour).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.1f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . stiffness of masked joints. -ve values mean don't apply stiffness or damping (just use defaults or ones applied by behaviours). If you are using animpose fullbody on its own then this gives the opprtunity to use setStffness and setMuscleStiffness messages to set up the character's muscles. mmmmtodo get rid of this -ve.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.1f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . damping of masked joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.EffectorMask
member.summary: Sets the EffectorMask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation).
member.remarks: Default value = ub.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.OverideHeadlook
member.summary: Sets the OverideHeadlook setting for this . overide Headlook behaviour (if animPose includes the head).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.OveridePointArm
member.summary: Sets the OveridePointArm setting for this . overide PointArm behaviour (if animPose includes the arm/arms).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.OveridePointGun
member.summary: Sets the OveridePointGun setting for this . overide PointGun behaviour (if animPose includes the arm/arms)//mmmmtodo not used at moment.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.UseZMPGravityCompensation
member.summary: Sets the UseZMPGravityCompensation setting for this . If true then modify gravity compensation based on stance (can reduce gravity compensation to zero if cofm is outside of balance area).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.GravityCompensation
member.summary: Sets the GravityCompensation setting for this . gravity compensation applied to joints in the effectorMask. If -ve then not applied (use current setting).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffnessLeftArm
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffnessLeftArm setting for this . muscle stiffness applied to left arm (applied after stiffness). If -ve then not applied (use current setting).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffnessRightArm
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffnessRightArm setting for this . muscle stiffness applied to right arm (applied after stiffness). If -ve then not applied (use current setting).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffnessSpine
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffnessSpine setting for this . muscle stiffness applied to spine (applied after stiffness). If -ve then not applied (use current setting).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffnessLeftLeg
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffnessLeftLeg setting for this . muscle stiffness applied to left leg (applied after stiffness). If -ve then not applied (use current setting).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.AnimPoseHelper.MuscleStiffnessRightLeg
member.summary: Sets the MuscleStiffnessRightLeg setting for this . muscle stiffness applied to right leg (applied after stiffness). If -ve then not applied (use current setting).

member.summary: Sets the SlumpMode setting for this . 0=Normal slump(less movement then slump and movement LT small), 1=fast slump, 2=less movement then slump.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColMassBelow

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.TimeToForward
member.summary: Sets the TimeToForward setting for this . time after a forwards impact before forwardMode is called (leave sometime for a rebound or brace - the min of 0.1 is to ensure fallOverWall can start although it probably needs only 1or2 frames for the probes to return).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ReboundForce

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.BraceWall
member.summary: Sets the BraceWall setting for this . Brace against wall if forwards impact(at the moment only if bodyBalance is running/in charge of arms).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.IgnoreColVolumeBelow
member.summary: Sets the IgnoreColVolumeBelow setting for this . collisions with non-fixed objects with volume below this will not set this behaviour off.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FallOverWallDrape
member.summary: Sets the FallOverWallDrape setting for this . use fallOverWall as the main drape reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.FallOverHighWalls
member.summary: Sets the FallOverHighWalls setting for this . trigger fall over wall if hit up to spine2 else only if hit up to spine1.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.Snap
member.summary: Sets the Snap setting for this . Add a Snap to when you hit a wall to emphasize the hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapMag
member.summary: Sets the SnapMag setting for this . The magnitude of the snap reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.6f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapDirectionRandomness
member.summary: Sets the SnapDirectionRandomness setting for this . The character snaps in a prescribed way (decided by bullet direction) - Higher the value the more random this direction is.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapLeftArm
member.summary: Sets the SnapLeftArm setting for this . snap the leftArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapRightArm
member.summary: Sets the SnapRightArm setting for this . snap the rightArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapLeftLeg
member.summary: Sets the SnapLeftLeg setting for this . snap the leftLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapRightLeg
member.summary: Sets the SnapRightLeg setting for this . snap the rightLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapSpine
member.summary: Sets the SnapSpine setting for this . snap the spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapNeck
member.summary: Sets the SnapNeck setting for this . snap the neck.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapPhasedLegs
member.summary: Sets the SnapPhasedLegs setting for this . Legs are either in phase with each other or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapHipType
member.summary: Sets the SnapHipType setting for this . type of hip reaction 0=none, 1=side2side 2=steplike.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.UnSnapInterval
member.summary: Sets the UnSnapInterval setting for this . Interval before applying reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.UnSnapRatio
member.summary: Sets the UnSnapRatio setting for this . The magnitude of the reverse snap.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.SnapUseTorques
member.summary: Sets the SnapUseTorques setting for this . use torques to make the snap otherwise use a change in the parts angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactWeaknessZeroDuration
member.summary: Sets the ImpactWeaknessZeroDuration setting for this . duration for which the character's upper body stays at minimum stiffness (not quite zero).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactWeaknessRampDuration
member.summary: Sets the ImpactWeaknessRampDuration setting for this . duration of the ramp to bring the character's upper body stiffness back to normal levels.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ImpactLoosenessAmount
member.summary: Sets the ImpactLoosenessAmount setting for this . how loose the character is on impact. between 0 and 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ObjectBehindVictim
member.summary: Sets the ObjectBehindVictim setting for this . detected an object behind a shot victim in the direction of a bullet?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ObjectBehindVictimPos
member.summary: Sets the ObjectBehindVictimPos setting for this . the intersection pos of a detected object behind a shot victim in the direction of a bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BalancerCollisionsReactionHelper.ObjectBehindVictimNormal
member.summary: Sets the ObjectBehindVictimNormal setting for this . the normal of a detected object behind a shot victim in the direction of a bullet.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyBalanceHelper for sending a BodyBalance to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyBalance to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this . NB. WAS m_bodyStiffness ClaviclesStiffness=9.0f.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Elbow
member.summary: Sets the Elbow setting for this . How much the elbow swings based on the leg movement.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Shoulder
member.summary: Sets the Shoulder setting for this . How much the shoulder(lean1) swings based on the leg movement.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Sets the ArmDamping setting for this . NB. WAS m_damping NeckDamping=1 ClaviclesDamping=1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this . enable and provide a look-at target to make the character's head turn to face it while balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HeadLookPos
member.summary: Sets the HeadLookPos setting for this . position of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HeadLookInstanceIndex
member.summary: Sets the HeadLookInstanceIndex setting for this . level index of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SpineStiffness
member.summary: Sets the SpineStiffness setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SomersaultAngle
member.summary: Sets the SomersaultAngle setting for this . multiplier of the somersault 'angle' (lean forward/back) for arms out (lean2).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SomersaultAngleThreshold
member.summary: Sets the SomersaultAngleThreshold setting for this . Amount of somersault 'angle' before m_somersaultAngle is used for ArmsOut. Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SideSomersaultAngle
member.summary: Sets the SideSomersaultAngle setting for this . Amount of side somersault 'angle' before sideSomersault is used for ArmsOut. Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 0.8.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SideSomersaultAngleThreshold
member.summary: Sets the SideSomersaultAngleThreshold setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BackwardsAutoTurn
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsAutoTurn setting for this . Automatically turn around if moving backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnWithBumpRadius
member.summary: Sets the TurnWithBumpRadius setting for this . 0.9 is a sensible value. If pusher within this distance then turn to get out of the way of the pusher.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BackwardsArms
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsArms setting for this . Bend elbows, relax shoulders and inhibit spine twist when moving backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BlendToZeroPose
member.summary: Sets the BlendToZeroPose setting for this . Blend upper body to zero pose as the character comes to rest. If false blend to a stored pose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPush
member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutOnPush setting for this . Put arms out based on lean2 of legs, or angular velocity (lean or twist), or lean (front/back or side/side).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPushMultiplier
member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutOnPushMultiplier setting for this . Arms out based on lean2 of the legs to simulate being pushed.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutOnPushTimeout
member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutOnPushTimeout setting for this . number of seconds before turning off the armsOutOnPush response only for Arms out based on lean2 of the legs (NOT for the angle or angular velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ReturningToBalanceArmsOut
member.summary: Sets the ReturningToBalanceArmsOut setting for this . range 0:1 0 = don't raise arms if returning to upright position, 0.x = 0.x*raise arms based on angvel and 'angle' settings, 1 = raise arms based on angvel and 'angle' settings.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutStraightenElbows
member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutStraightenElbows setting for this . multiplier for straightening the elbows based on the amount of arms out(lean2) 0 = dont straighten elbows. Otherwise straighten elbows proportionately to armsOut.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ArmsOutMinLean2
member.summary: Sets the ArmsOutMinLean2 setting for this . Minimum desiredLean2 applied to shoulder (to stop arms going above shoulder height or not).
member.remarks: Default value = -9.9f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.SpineDamping
member.summary: Sets the SpineDamping setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.UseBodyTurn
member.summary: Sets the UseBodyTurn setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ElbowAngleOnContact
member.summary: Sets the ElbowAngleOnContact setting for this . on contact with upperbody the desired elbow angle is set to at least this value.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BendElbowsTime
member.summary: Sets the BendElbowsTime setting for this . Time after contact (with Upper body) that the min m_elbowAngleOnContact is applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BendElbowsGait
member.summary: Sets the BendElbowsGait setting for this . Minimum desired angle of elbow during non contact arm swing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HipL2ArmL2
member.summary: Sets the HipL2ArmL2 setting for this . mmmmdrunk = 0.2 multiplier of hip lean2 (star jump) to give shoulder lean2 (flapping).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ShoulderL2
member.summary: Sets the ShoulderL2 setting for this . mmmmdrunk = 0.7 shoulder lean2 offset.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ShoulderL1
member.summary: Sets the ShoulderL1 setting for this . mmmmdrunk 1.1 shoulder lean1 offset (+ve frankenstein).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ShoulderTwist
member.summary: Sets the ShoulderTwist setting for this . mmmmdrunk = 0.0 shoulder twist.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.4f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HeadLookAtVelProb
member.summary: Sets the HeadLookAtVelProb setting for this . Probability [0-1] that headLook will be looking in the direction of velocity when stepping.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnOffProb
member.summary: Sets the TurnOffProb setting for this . Weighted Probability that turn will be off. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Turn2VelProb
member.summary: Sets the Turn2VelProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning towards velocity. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnAwayProb
member.summary: Sets the TurnAwayProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning away from headLook target. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnLeftProb
member.summary: Sets the TurnLeftProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning left. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TurnRightProb
member.summary: Sets the TurnRightProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning right. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.Turn2TargetProb
member.summary: Sets the Turn2TargetProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning towards headLook target. This is one of six turn type weights.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.AngVelMultiplier
member.summary: Sets the AngVelMultiplier setting for this . somersault, twist, sideSomersault) multiplier of the angular velocity for arms out (lean2) (somersault, twist, sideSomersault).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(4.0f, 1.0f, 4.0f). Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.AngVelThreshold
member.summary: Sets the AngVelThreshold setting for this . somersault, twist, sideSomersault) threshold above which angVel is used for arms out (lean2) Unless drunk - DO NOT EXCEED 7.0 for each component.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(1.2f, 3.0f, 1.2f). Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BraceDistance
member.summary: Sets the BraceDistance setting for this . if -ve then do not brace. distance from object at which to raise hands to brace 0.5 good if newBrace=true - otherwise 0.65.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TargetPredictionTime
member.summary: Sets the TargetPredictionTime setting for this . time expected to get arms up from idle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.ReachAbsorbtionTime
member.summary: Sets the ReachAbsorbtionTime setting for this . larger values and he absorbs the impact more.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BraceStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BraceStiffness setting for this . stiffness of character. catch_fall stiffness scales with this too, with its defaults at this values default.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MinBraceTime
member.summary: Sets the MinBraceTime setting for this . minimum bracing time so the character doesn't look twitchy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.TimeToBackwardsBrace
member.summary: Sets the TimeToBackwardsBrace setting for this . time before arm brace kicks in when hit from behind.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HandsDelayMin
member.summary: Sets the HandsDelayMin setting for this . If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at least this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.HandsDelayMax
member.summary: Sets the HandsDelayMax setting for this . If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at most this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.BraceOffset
member.summary: Sets the BraceOffset setting for this . braceTarget is global headLookPos plus braceOffset m in the up direction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MoveRadius
member.summary: Sets the MoveRadius setting for this . if -ve don't move away from pusher unless moveWhenBracing is true and braceDistance GT 0.0f. if the pusher is closer than moveRadius then move away from it.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MoveAmount
member.summary: Sets the MoveAmount setting for this . amount of leanForce applied away from pusher.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyBalanceHelper.MoveWhenBracing
member.summary: Sets the MoveWhenBracing setting for this . Only move away from pusher when bracing against pusher.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyFoetalHelper for sending a BodyFoetal to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyFoetal to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . The stiffness of the body determines how fast the character moves into the position, and how well that they hold it.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.DampingFactor
member.summary: Sets the DampingFactor setting for this . Sets damping value for the character joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.Asymmetry
member.summary: Sets the Asymmetry setting for this . A value between 0-1 that controls how asymmetric the results are by varying stiffness across the body.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.RandomSeed
member.summary: Sets the RandomSeed setting for this . Random seed used to generate asymmetry values.
member.remarks: Default value = 100. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.BackTwist
member.summary: Sets the BackTwist setting for this . Amount of random back twist to add.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyFoetalHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyRollUpHelper for sending a BodyRollUp to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyRollUp to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . stiffness of whole body.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.UseArmToSlowDown
member.summary: Sets the UseArmToSlowDown setting for this . the degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.3f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.ArmReachAmount
member.summary: Sets the ArmReachAmount setting for this . the likeliness of the character reaching for the ground with its arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.LegPush
member.summary: Sets the LegPush setting for this . used to keep rolling down slope, 1 is full (kicks legs out when pointing upwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: Sets the AsymmetricalLegs setting for this . 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -2.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.NoRollTimeBeforeSuccess
member.summary: Sets the NoRollTimeBeforeSuccess setting for this . time that roll velocity has to be lower than rollVelForSuccess, before success message is sent.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.RollVelForSuccess
member.summary: Sets the RollVelForSuccess setting for this . lower threshold for roll velocity at which success message can be sent.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.RollVelLinearContribution
member.summary: Sets the RollVelLinearContribution setting for this . contribution of linear COM velocity to roll Velocity (if 0, roll velocity equal to COM angular velocity).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.VelocityScale
member.summary: Sets the VelocityScale setting for this . Scales perceived body velocity. The higher this value gets, the more quickly the velocity measure saturates, resulting in a tighter roll at slower speeds. (NB: Set to 1 to match earlier behaviour).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.VelocityOffset
member.summary: Sets the VelocityOffset setting for this . Offsets perceived body velocity. Increase to create larger "dead zone" around zero velocity where character will be less rolled. (NB: Reset to 0 to match earlier behaviour).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyRollUpHelper.ApplyMinMaxFriction
member.summary: Sets the ApplyMinMaxFriction setting for this . Controls whether or not behaviour enforces min/max friction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BodyWritheHelper for sending a BodyWrithe to a given .
member.param: The to send the BodyWrithe to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BackStiffness setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegStiffness setting for this . The stiffness of the character will determine how 'determined' a writhe this is - high values will make him thrash about wildly.
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Sets the ArmDamping setting for this . damping amount, less is underdamped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackDamping
member.summary: Sets the BackDamping setting for this . damping amount, less is underdamped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegDamping
member.summary: Sets the LegDamping setting for this . damping amount, less is underdamped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmPeriod
member.summary: Sets the ArmPeriod setting for this . Controls how fast the writhe is executed, smaller values make faster motions.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackPeriod
member.summary: Sets the BackPeriod setting for this . Controls how fast the writhe is executed, smaller values make faster motions.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegPeriod
member.summary: Sets the LegPeriod setting for this . Controls how fast the writhe is executed, smaller values make faster motions.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the ArmAmplitude setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BackAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the BackAmplitude setting for this . scales the amount of writhe. 0 = no writhe.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.LegAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the LegAmplitude setting for this . scales the amount of writhe. 0 = no writhe.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ElbowAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the ElbowAmplitude setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.KneeAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the KneeAmplitude setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollOverFlag
member.summary: Sets the RollOverFlag setting for this . Flag to set trying to rollOver.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BlendArms
member.summary: Sets the BlendArms setting for this . Blend the writhe arms with the current desired arms (0=don't apply any writhe, 1=only writhe).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BlendBack
member.summary: Sets the BlendBack setting for this . Blend the writhe spine and neck with the current desired (0=don't apply any writhe, 1=only writhe).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.BlendLegs
member.summary: Sets the BlendLegs setting for this . Blend the writhe legs with the current desired legs (0=don't apply any writhe, 1=only writhe).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ApplyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ApplyStiffness setting for this . Use writhe stiffnesses if true. If false don't set any stiffnesses.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.OnFire
member.summary: Sets the OnFire setting for this . Extra shoulderBlend. Rolling:one way only, maxRollOverTime, rollOverRadius, doesn't reduce arm stiffness to help rolling. No shoulder twist.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ShoulderLean1
member.summary: Sets the ShoulderLean1 setting for this . Blend writhe shoulder desired lean1 with this angle in RAD. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.ShoulderLean2
member.summary: Sets the ShoulderLean2 setting for this . Blend writhe shoulder desired lean2 with this angle in RAD. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Lean1BlendFactor
member.summary: Sets the Lean1BlendFactor setting for this . Shoulder desired lean1 with shoulderLean1 angle blend factor. Set it to 0 to use original shoulder withe desired lean1 angle for shoulders. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.Lean2BlendFactor
member.summary: Sets the Lean2BlendFactor setting for this . Shoulder desired lean2 with shoulderLean2 angle blend factor. Set it to 0 to use original shoulder withe desired lean2 angle for shoulders. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the RollTorqueScale setting for this . Scale rolling torque that is applied to character spine.
member.remarks: Default value = 150.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 300.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.MaxRollOverTime
member.summary: Sets the MaxRollOverTime setting for this . Rolling torque is ramped down over time. At this time in seconds torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict time the character is rolling. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 60.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BodyWritheHelper.RollOverRadius
member.summary: Sets the RollOverRadius setting for this . Rolling torque is ramped down with distance measured from position where character hit the ground and started rolling. At this distance in meters torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict distance the character travels due to rolling. Note that onFire has to be set to true for this parameter to take any effect.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BraceForImpactHelper for sending a BraceForImpact to a given .
member.param: The to send the BraceForImpact to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BraceDistance
member.summary: Sets the BraceDistance setting for this . distance from object at which to raise hands to brace 0.5 good if newBrace=true - otherwise 0.65.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.TargetPredictionTime
member.summary: Sets the TargetPredictionTime setting for this . time epected to get arms up from idle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.ReachAbsorbtionTime
member.summary: Sets the ReachAbsorbtionTime setting for this . larger values and he absorbs the impact more.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.InstanceIndex
member.summary: Sets the InstanceIndex setting for this . levelIndex of object to brace.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of character. catch_fall stiffness scales with this too, with its defaults at this values default.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabDontLetGo
member.summary: Sets the GrabDontLetGo setting for this . Once a constraint is made, keep reaching with whatever hand is allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabStrength
member.summary: Sets the GrabStrength setting for this . strength in hands for grabbing (kg m/s), -1 to ignore/disable.
member.remarks: Default value = 40.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabDistance
member.summary: Sets the GrabDistance setting for this . Relative distance at which the grab starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabReachAngle
member.summary: Sets the GrabReachAngle setting for this . Angle from front at which the grab activates. If the point is outside this angle from front will not try to grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.2f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GrabHoldTimer
member.summary: Sets the GrabHoldTimer setting for this . amount of time, in seconds, before grab automatically bails.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MaxGrabCarVelocity
member.summary: Sets the MaxGrabCarVelocity setting for this . Don't try to grab a car moving above this speed mmmmtodo make this the relative velocity of car to character?.
member.remarks: Default value = 95.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegStiffness setting for this . Balancer leg stiffness mmmmtodo remove this parameter and use configureBalance?.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.TimeToBackwardsBrace
member.summary: Sets the TimeToBackwardsBrace setting for this . time before arm brace kicks in when hit from behind.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Look
member.summary: Sets the Look setting for this . position to look at, e.g. the driver.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Pos
member.summary: Sets the Pos setting for this . location of the front part of the object to brace against. This should be the centre of where his hands should meet the object.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MinBraceTime
member.summary: Sets the MinBraceTime setting for this . minimum bracing time so the character doesn't look twitchy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.HandsDelayMin
member.summary: Sets the HandsDelayMin setting for this . If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at least this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.HandsDelayMax
member.summary: Sets the HandsDelayMax setting for this . If bracing with 2 hands delay one hand by at most this amount of time to introduce some asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveAway
member.summary: Sets the MoveAway setting for this . move away from the car (if in reaching zone).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveAwayAmount
member.summary: Sets the MoveAwayAmount setting for this . forceLean away amount (-ve is lean towards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveAwayLean
member.summary: Sets the MoveAwayLean setting for this . Lean away amount (-ve is lean towards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.MoveSideways
member.summary: Sets the MoveSideways setting for this . Amount of sideways movement if at the front or back of the car to add to the move away from car.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BbArms
member.summary: Sets the BbArms setting for this . Use bodyBalance arms for the default (non bracing) behaviour if bodyBalance is active.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.NewBrace
member.summary: Sets the NewBrace setting for this . Use the new brace prediction code.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.BraceOnImpact
member.summary: Sets the BraceOnImpact setting for this . If true then if a shin or thigh is in contact with the car then brace. NB: newBrace must be true. For those situations where the car has pushed the ped backwards (at the same speed as the car) before the behaviour has been started and so doesn't predict an impact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.Roll2Velocity
member.summary: Sets the Roll2Velocity setting for this . When rollDownStairs is running use roll2Velocity to control the helper torques (this only attempts to roll to the chaarcter's velocity not some default linear velocity mag.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.RollType
member.summary: Sets the RollType setting for this . 0 = original/roll off/stay on car: Roll with character velocity, 1 = //Gentle: roll off/stay on car = use relative velocity of character to car to roll against, 2 = //roll over car: Roll against character velocity. i.e. roll against any velocity picked up by hitting car, 3 = //Gentle: roll over car: use relative velocity of character to car to roll with.
member.remarks: Default value = 3. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapImpacts
member.summary: Sets the SnapImpacts setting for this . Exaggerate impacts using snap.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapImpact
member.summary: Sets the SnapImpact setting for this . Exaggeration amount of the initial impact (legs). +ve fold with car impact (as if pushed at hips in the car velocity direction). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapBonnet
member.summary: Sets the SnapBonnet setting for this . Exaggeration amount of the secondary (torso) impact with bonnet. +ve fold with car impact (as if pushed at hips by the impact normal). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = -7.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.SnapFloor
member.summary: Sets the SnapFloor setting for this . Exaggeration amount of the impact with the floor after falling off of car +ve fold with floor impact (as if pushed at hips in the impact normal direction). -ve fold away from car impact.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampVel
member.summary: Sets the DampVel setting for this . Damp out excessive spin and upward velocity when on car.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampSpin
member.summary: Sets the DampSpin setting for this . Amount to damp spinning by (cartwheeling and somersaulting).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampUpVel
member.summary: Sets the DampUpVel setting for this . Amount to damp upward velocity by to limit the amount of air above the car the character can get.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 40.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampSpinThresh
member.summary: Sets the DampSpinThresh setting for this . Angular velocity above which we start damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.DampUpVelThresh
member.summary: Sets the DampUpVelThresh setting for this . Upward velocity above which we start damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsHelp
member.summary: Sets the GsHelp setting for this . Enhance a glancing spin with the side of the car by modulating body friction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsEndMin
member.summary: Sets the GsEndMin setting for this . ID for glancing spin. min depth to be considered from either end (front/rear) of a car (-ve is inside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = -0.1f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsSideMin
member.summary: Sets the GsSideMin setting for this . ID for glancing spin. min depth to be considered on the side of a car (-ve is inside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = -0.2f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsSideMax
member.summary: Sets the GsSideMax setting for this . ID for glancing spin. max depth to be considered on the side of a car (+ve is outside the car area).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsUpness
member.summary: Sets the GsUpness setting for this . ID for glancing spin. Character has to be more upright than this value for it to be considered on the side of a car. Fully upright = 1, upsideDown = -1. Max Angle from upright is acos(gsUpness).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsCarVelMin
member.summary: Sets the GsCarVelMin setting for this . ID for glancing spin. Minimum car velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsScale1Foot
member.summary: Sets the GsScale1Foot setting for this . Apply gsFricScale1 to the foot if colliding with car. (Otherwise foot friction - with the ground - is determined by gsFricScale2 if it is in gsFricMask2).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricScale1
member.summary: Sets the GsFricScale1 setting for this . Glancing spin help. Friction scale applied when to the side of the car. e.g. make the character spin more by upping the friction against the car.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricMask1
member.summary: Sets the GsFricMask1 setting for this . Glancing spin help. Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation). Note gsFricMask1 and gsFricMask2 are made independent by the code so you can have fb for gsFricMask1 but gsFricScale1 will not be applied to any bodyParts in gsFricMask2.
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricScale2
member.summary: Sets the GsFricScale2 setting for this . Glancing spin help. Friction scale applied when to the side of the car. e.g. make the character spin more by lowering the feet friction. You could also lower the wrist friction here to stop the car pulling along the hands i.e. gsFricMask2 = la|uw.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BraceForImpactHelper.GsFricMask2
member.summary: Sets the GsFricMask2 setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see notes for explanation). Note gsFricMask1 and gsFricMask2 are made independent by the code so you can have fb for gsFricMask1 but gsFricScale1 will not be applied to any bodyParts in gsFricMask2.
member.remarks: Default value = la.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper
member.summary: Simple buoyancy model. No character movement just fluid forces/torques added to parts.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the BuoyancyHelper for sending a Buoyancy to a given .
member.param: The to send the Buoyancy to.
member.remarks: Simple buoyancy model. No character movement just fluid forces/torques added to parts.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.SurfacePoint
member.summary: Sets the SurfacePoint setting for this . Arbitrary point on surface of water.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.SurfaceNormal
member.summary: Sets the SurfaceNormal setting for this . Normal to surface of water.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f). Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.Buoyancy
member.summary: Sets the Buoyancy setting for this . Buoyancy multiplier.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.ChestBuoyancy
member.summary: Sets the ChestBuoyancy setting for this . Buoyancy mulplier for spine2/3. Helps character float upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . Damping for submerged parts.
member.remarks: Default value = 40.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.Righting
member.summary: Sets the Righting setting for this . Use righting torque to being character face-up in water?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.RightingStrength
member.summary: Sets the RightingStrength setting for this . Strength of righting torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 25.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.BuoyancyHelper.RightingTime
member.summary: Sets the RightingTime setting for this . How long to wait after chest hits water to begin righting torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the CatchFallHelper for sending a CatchFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the CatchFall to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.TorsoStiffness
member.summary: Sets the TorsoStiffness setting for this . stiffness of torso.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.LegsStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegsStiffness setting for this . stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 6.0f. Min value = 4.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ArmsStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmsStiffness setting for this . stiffness of arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.BackwardsMinArmOffset
member.summary: Sets the BackwardsMinArmOffset setting for this . 0 will prop arms up near his shoulders. -0.3 will place hands nearer his behind.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ForwardMaxArmOffset
member.summary: Sets the ForwardMaxArmOffset setting for this . 0 will point arms down with angled body, 0.45 will point arms forward a bit to catch nearer the head.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Sets the ZAxisSpinReduction setting for this . Tries to reduce the spin around the Z axis. Scale 0 - 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.ExtraSit
member.summary: Sets the ExtraSit setting for this . Scale extra-sit value 0..1. Setting to 0 helps with arched-back issues. Set to 1 for a more alive-looking finish.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this . Toggle to use the head look in this behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.CatchFallHelper.Mask
member.summary: Sets the Mask setting for this . Two character body-masking value, bitwise joint mask or bitwise logic string of two character body-masking value (see Active Pose notes for possible values).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ElectrocuteHelper for sending a Electrocute to a given .
member.param: The to send the Electrocute to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.StunMag
member.summary: Sets the StunMag setting for this . The magnitude of the reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.InitialMult
member.summary: Sets the InitialMult setting for this . initialMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the 1st snap reaction (other mults are applied after this).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMult
member.summary: Sets the LargeMult setting for this . largeMult*stunMag = The magnitude of a random large snap reaction (other mults are applied after this).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMinTime
member.summary: Sets the LargeMinTime setting for this . min time to next large random snap (about 14 snaps with stunInterval = 0.07s).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LargeMaxTime
member.summary: Sets the LargeMaxTime setting for this . max time to next large random snap (about 28 snaps with stunInterval = 0.07s).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.MovingMult
member.summary: Sets the MovingMult setting for this . movingMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.BalancingMult
member.summary: Sets the BalancingMult setting for this . balancingMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if balancing = (not lying on the floor/ not upper body not collided) and not airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.AirborneMult
member.summary: Sets the AirborneMult setting for this . airborneMult*stunMag = The magnitude of the reaction if airborne.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.MovingThresh
member.summary: Sets the MovingThresh setting for this . If moving(comVelMag) faster than movingThresh then mvingMult applied to stunMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.StunInterval
member.summary: Sets the StunInterval setting for this . Direction flips every stunInterval.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.DirectionRandomness
member.summary: Sets the DirectionRandomness setting for this . The character vibrates in a prescribed way - Higher the value the more random this direction is.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LeftArm
member.summary: Sets the LeftArm setting for this . vibrate the leftArm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.RightArm
member.summary: Sets the RightArm setting for this . vibrate the rightArm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.LeftLeg
member.summary: Sets the LeftLeg setting for this . vibrate the leftLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.RightLeg
member.summary: Sets the RightLeg setting for this . vibrate the rightLeg.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.Spine
member.summary: Sets the Spine setting for this . vibrate the spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.Neck
member.summary: Sets the Neck setting for this . vibrate the neck.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.PhasedLegs
member.summary: Sets the PhasedLegs setting for this . Legs are either in phase with each other or not.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.ApplyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ApplyStiffness setting for this . let electrocute apply a (higher generally) stiffness to the character whilst being vibrated.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.UseTorques
member.summary: Sets the UseTorques setting for this . use torques to make vibration otherwise use a change in the parts angular velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ElectrocuteHelper.HipType
member.summary: Sets the HipType setting for this . type of hip reaction 0=none, 1=side2side 2=steplike.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the FallOverWallHelper for sending a FallOverWall to a given .
member.param: The to send the FallOverWall to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of the body, roll up stiffness scales with this and defaults at this default value.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . Damping in the effectors.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MagOfForce
member.summary: Sets the MagOfForce setting for this . Magnitude of the falloverWall helper force.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxDistanceFromPelToHitPoint
member.summary: Sets the MaxDistanceFromPelToHitPoint setting for this . The maximum distance away from the pelvis that hit points will be registered.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxForceDist
member.summary: Sets the MaxForceDist setting for this . maximum distance between hitPoint and body part at which forces are applied to part.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.StepExclusionZone
member.summary: Sets the StepExclusionZone setting for this . Specifies extent of area in front of the wall in which balancer won't try to take another step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MinLegHeight
member.summary: Sets the MinLegHeight setting for this . minimum height of pelvis above feet at which fallOverWall is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BodyTwist
member.summary: Sets the BodyTwist setting for this . amount of twist to apply to the spine as the character tries to fling himself over the wall, provides more of a believable roll but increases the amount of lateral space the character needs to successfully flip.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxTwist
member.summary: Sets the MaxTwist setting for this . max angle the character can twist before twsit helper torques are turned off.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.FallOverWallEndA
member.summary: Sets the FallOverWallEndA setting for this . One end of the wall to try to fall over.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.FallOverWallEndB
member.summary: Sets the FallOverWallEndB setting for this . One end of the wall over which we are trying to fall over.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ForceAngleAbort
member.summary: Sets the ForceAngleAbort setting for this . The angle abort threshold.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.2f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ForceTimeOut
member.summary: Sets the ForceTimeOut setting for this . The force time out.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MoveArms
member.summary: Sets the MoveArms setting for this . Lift the arms up if true. Do nothing with the arms if false (eg when using catchfall arms or brace etc).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MoveLegs
member.summary: Sets the MoveLegs setting for this . Move the legs if true. Do nothing with the legs if false (eg when using dynamicBalancer etc).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.BendSpine
member.summary: Sets the BendSpine setting for this . Bend spine to help falloverwall if true. Do nothing with the spine if false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AngleDirWithWallNormal
member.summary: Sets the AngleDirWithWallNormal setting for this . Maximum angle in degrees (between the direction of the velocity of the COM and the wall normal) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 180.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.LeaningAngleThreshold
member.summary: Sets the LeaningAngleThreshold setting for this . Maximum angle in degrees (between the vertical vector and a vector from pelvis to lower neck) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 180.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxAngVel
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngVel setting for this . if the angular velocity is higher than maxAngVel, the torques and forces are not applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AdaptForcesToLowWall
member.summary: Sets the AdaptForcesToLowWall setting for this . Will reduce the magnitude of the forces applied to the character to help him to fall over wall.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MaxWallHeight
member.summary: Sets the MaxWallHeight setting for this . Maximum height (from the lowest foot) to start to apply forces and torques to fall over the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.DistanceToSendSuccessMessage
member.summary: Sets the DistanceToSendSuccessMessage setting for this . Minimum distance between the pelvis and the wall to send the success message. If negative doesn't take this parameter into account when sending feedback.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.RollingBackThr
member.summary: Sets the RollingBackThr setting for this . Value of the angular velocity about the wallEgde above which the character is considered as rolling backwards i.e. goes in to fow_RollingBack state.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.RollingPotential
member.summary: Sets the RollingPotential setting for this . On impact with the wall if the rollingPotential(calculated from the characters linear velocity w.r.t the wall) is greater than this value the character will try to go over the wall otherwise it won't try (fow_Aborted).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.UseArmIK
member.summary: Sets the UseArmIK setting for this . Try to reach the wallEdge. To configure the IK : use limitAngleBack, limitAngleFront and limitAngleTotallyBack.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.ReachDistanceFromHitPoint
member.summary: Sets the ReachDistanceFromHitPoint setting for this . distance from predicted hitpoint where each hands will try to reach the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.MinReachDistanceFromHitPoint
member.summary: Sets the MinReachDistanceFromHitPoint setting for this . minimal distance from predicted hitpoint where each hands will try to reach the wall. Used if the hand target is outside the wall Edge.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.FallOverWallHelper.AngleTotallyBack
member.summary: Sets the AngleTotallyBack setting for this . max angle in degrees (between 1.the vector between two hips and 2. wallEdge) to try to reach the wall just behind his pelvis with his arms when the character is back to the wall.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the GrabHelper for sending a Grab to a given .

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.UseLeft
member.summary: Sets the UseLeft setting for this . Flag to toggle use of left hand.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.UseRight
member.summary: Sets the UseRight setting for this . Flag to toggle the use of the Right hand.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.DropWeaponIfNecessary
member.summary: Sets the DropWeaponIfNecessary setting for this . if hasn't grabbed when weapon carrying hand is close to target, grab anyway.
