member.summary: Sets the DropWeaponDistance setting for this . distance below which a weapon carrying hand will request weapon to be dropped.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.GrabStrength
member.summary: Sets the GrabStrength setting for this . strength in hands for grabbing (kg m/s), -1 to ignore/disable.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.StickyHands
member.summary: Sets the StickyHands setting for this . strength of cheat force on hands to pull towards target and stick to target ("cleverHandIK" strength).
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.TurnToTarget
member.summary: Sets the TurnToTarget setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = .

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.GrabHoldMaxTimer
member.summary: Sets the GrabHoldMaxTimer setting for this . amount of time, in seconds, before grab automatically bails.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.PullUpTime
member.summary: Sets the PullUpTime setting for this . Time to reach the full pullup strength.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.PullUpStrengthRight
member.summary: Sets the PullUpStrengthRight setting for this . Strength to pull up with the right arm. 0 = no pull up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.PullUpStrengthLeft
member.summary: Sets the PullUpStrengthLeft setting for this . Strength to pull up with the left arm. 0 = no pull up.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos1
member.summary: Sets the Pos1 setting for this . Grab pos1, right hand if not using line or surface grab.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos2
member.summary: Sets the Pos2 setting for this . Grab pos2, left hand if not using line or surface grab.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos3
member.summary: Sets the Pos3 setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Pos4
member.summary: Sets the Pos4 setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalR
member.summary: Sets the NormalR setting for this . Normal for the right grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalL
member.summary: Sets the NormalL setting for this . Normal for the left grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalR2
member.summary: Sets the NormalR2 setting for this . Normal for the 2nd right grab point (if pointsX4grab=true).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.NormalL2
member.summary: Sets the NormalL2 setting for this . Normal for the 3rd left grab point (if pointsX4grab=true).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.HandsCollide
member.summary: Sets the HandsCollide setting for this . Hand collisions on when grabbing (false turns off hand collisions making grab more stable esp. to grab points slightly inside geometry).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.JustBrace
member.summary: Sets the JustBrace setting for this . Flag to toggle between grabbing and bracing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.UseLineGrab
member.summary: Sets the UseLineGrab setting for this . use the line grab, Grab along the line (x-x2).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.PointsX4grab
member.summary: Sets the PointsX4grab setting for this . use 2 point.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.FromEA
member.summary: Sets the FromEA setting for this . use 2 point.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.SurfaceGrab
member.summary: Sets the SurfaceGrab setting for this . Toggle surface grab on. Requires pos1,pos2,pos3 and pos4 to be specified.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.InstanceIndex
member.summary: Sets the InstanceIndex setting for this . levelIndex of instance to grab (-1 = world coordinates).
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.InstancePartIndex
member.summary: Sets the InstancePartIndex setting for this . boundIndex of part on instance to grab (0 = just use instance coordinates).
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.DontLetGo
member.summary: Sets the DontLetGo setting for this . Once a constraint is made, keep reaching with whatever hand is allowed - no matter what the angle/distance and whether or not the constraint has broken due to constraintForce GT grabStrength. mmmtodo this is a badly named parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of upper body. Scales the arm grab such that the armStiffness is default when this is at default value.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.ReachAngle
member.summary: Sets the ReachAngle setting for this . Angle from front at which the grab activates. If the point is outside this angle from front will not try to grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.OneSideReachAngle
member.summary: Sets the OneSideReachAngle setting for this . Angle at which we will only reach with one hand.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.GrabDistance
member.summary: Sets the GrabDistance setting for this . Relative distance at which the grab starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.Move2Radius
member.summary: Sets the Move2Radius setting for this . Relative distance (additional to grabDistance - doesn't try to move inside grabDistance)at which the grab tries to use the balancer to move to the grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 14.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this . Stiffness of the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 14.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.MaxReachDistance
member.summary: Sets the MaxReachDistance setting for this . distance to reach out towards the grab point.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.OrientationConstraintScale
member.summary: Sets the OrientationConstraintScale setting for this . scale torque used to rotate hands to face normals.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.MaxWristAngle
member.summary: Sets the MaxWristAngle setting for this . When we are grabbing the max angle the wrist ccan be at before we break the grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.2f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.UseHeadLookToTarget
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLookToTarget setting for this . if true, the character will look at targetForHeadLook after a hand grabs until the end of the behavior. (Before grabbing it looks at the grab target).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.LookAtGrab
member.summary: Sets the LookAtGrab setting for this . if true, the character will look at the grab.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.GrabHelper.TargetForHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the TargetForHeadLook setting for this . Only used if useHeadLookToTarget is true, the target in world space to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the HeadLookHelper for sending a HeadLook to a given .
member.param: The to send the HeadLook to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . Damping of the muscles.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . Stiffness of the muscles.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.InstanceIndex
member.summary: Sets the InstanceIndex setting for this . levelIndex of object to be looked at. vel parameters are ignored if this is non -1.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Vel
member.summary: Sets the Vel setting for this . The velocity of the point being looked at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f). Min value = -100.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.Pos
member.summary: Sets the Pos setting for this . The point being looked at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.AlwaysLook
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysLook setting for this . Flag to force always to look.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.EyesHorizontal
member.summary: Sets the EyesHorizontal setting for this . Keep the eyes horizontal. Use true for impact with cars. Use false if you want better look at target accuracy when the character is on the floor or leaned over alot.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.AlwaysEyesHorizontal
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysEyesHorizontal setting for this . Keep the eyes horizontal. Use true for impact with cars. Use false if you want better look at target accuracy when the character is on the floor or leaned over (when not leaned over the eyes are still kept horizontal if eyesHorizontal=true ) alot.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.KeepHeadAwayFromGround
member.summary: Sets the KeepHeadAwayFromGround setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HeadLookHelper.TwistSpine
member.summary: Sets the TwistSpine setting for this . Allow headlook to twist spine.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the HighFallHelper for sending a HighFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the HighFall to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of body. Value feeds through to bodyBalance (synched with defaults), to armsWindmill (14 for this value at default ), legs pedal, head look and roll down stairs directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Bodydamping
member.summary: Sets the Bodydamping setting for this . The damping of the joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Catchfalltime
member.summary: Sets the Catchfalltime setting for this . The length of time before the impact that the character transitions to the landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.CrashOrLandCutOff
member.summary: Sets the CrashOrLandCutOff setting for this . 0.52angle is 0.868 dot//A threshold for deciding how far away from upright the character needs to be before bailing out (going into a foetal) instead of trying to land (keeping stretched out). NB: never does bailout if ignorWorldCollisions true.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.PdStrength
member.summary: Sets the PdStrength setting for this . Strength of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.PdDamping
member.summary: Sets the PdDamping setting for this . Damping multiplier of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical. The actual damping is pdDamping*pdStrength*constant*angVel.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmAngSpeed
member.summary: Sets the ArmAngSpeed setting for this . arm circling speed in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the ArmAmplitude setting for this . in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmPhase
member.summary: Sets the ArmPhase setting for this . in armWindMillAdaptive 3.1 opposite for stuntman. 1.0 old default. 0.0 in phase.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmBendElbows
member.summary: Sets the ArmBendElbows setting for this . in armWindMillAdaptive bend the elbows as a function of armAngle. For stuntman true otherwise false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegRadius
member.summary: Sets the LegRadius setting for this . radius of legs on pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegAngSpeed
member.summary: Sets the LegAngSpeed setting for this . in pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegAsymmetry
member.summary: Sets the LegAsymmetry setting for this . 0.0 for stuntman. Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronise the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Arms2LegsPhase
member.summary: Sets the Arms2LegsPhase setting for this . phase angle between the arms and legs circling angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Arms2LegsSync
member.summary: Sets the Arms2LegsSync setting for this . Syncs the arms angle to what the leg angle is.
member.remarks: Default value = . All speed/direction parameters of armswindmill are overwritten if = . If and you want synced arms/legs then armAngSpeed=legAngSpeed, legAsymmetry = 0.0 (to stop randomizations of the leg cicle speed).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.ArmsUp
member.summary: Sets the ArmsUp setting for this . Where to put the arms when preparing to land. Approx 1 = above head, 0 = head height, -1 = down. LT -2.0 use catchFall arms, LT -3.0 use prepare for landing pose if Agent is due to land vertically, feet first.
member.remarks: Default value = -3.1f. Min value = -4.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateBodyToFallDirection
member.summary: Sets the OrientateBodyToFallDirection setting for this . toggle to orientate to fall direction. i.e. orientate so that the character faces the horizontal velocity direction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateTwist
member.summary: Sets the OrientateTwist setting for this . If false don't worry about the twist angle of the character when orientating the character. If false this allows the twist axis of the character to be free (You can get a nice twisting highFall like the one in dieHard 4 when the car goes into the helicopter).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.OrientateMax
member.summary: Sets the OrientateMax setting for this . DEVEL parameter - suggest you don't edit it. Maximum torque the orientation controller can apply. If 0 then no helper torques will be used. 300 will orientate the character soflty for all but extreme angles away from aimAngleBase. If abs (current -aimAngleBase) is getting near 3.0 then this can be reduced to give a softer feel.
member.remarks: Default value = 300.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AlanRickman
member.summary: Sets the AlanRickman setting for this . If true then orientate the character to face the point from where it started falling. HighFall like the one in dieHard with Alan Rickman.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardRoll
member.summary: Sets the FowardRoll setting for this . Try to execute a forward Roll on landing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll
member.summary: Sets the UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll setting for this . Blend to a zero pose when forward roll is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AimAngleBase
member.summary: Sets the AimAngleBase setting for this . Angle from vertical the pdController is driving to ( positive = forwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -3.1f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardVelRotation
member.summary: Sets the FowardVelRotation setting for this . scale to add/subtract from aimAngle based on forward speed (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FootVelCompScale
member.summary: Sets the FootVelCompScale setting for this . Scale to change to amount of vel that is added to the foot ik from the velocity (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.SideD
member.summary: Sets the SideD setting for this . sideoffset for the feet during prepareForLanding. +ve = right.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.FowardOffsetOfLegIK
member.summary: Sets the FowardOffsetOfLegIK setting for this . Forward offset for the feet during prepareForLanding.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegL
member.summary: Sets the LegL setting for this . Leg Length for ik (Internal)//unused.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.CatchFallCutOff
member.summary: Sets the CatchFallCutOff setting for this . 0.5angle is 0.878 dot. Cutoff to go to the catchFall ( internal) //mmmtodo do like crashOrLandCutOff.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LegStrength
member.summary: Sets the LegStrength setting for this . Strength of the legs at landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Balance
member.summary: Sets the Balance setting for this . If true have enough strength to balance. If false not enough strength in legs to balance (even though bodyBlance called).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.IgnorWorldCollisions
member.summary: Sets the IgnorWorldCollisions setting for this . Never go into bailout (foetal).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.AdaptiveCircling
member.summary: Sets the AdaptiveCircling setting for this . stuntman type fall. Arm and legs circling direction controlled by angmom and orientation.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.Hula
member.summary: Sets the Hula setting for this . With stuntman type fall. Hula reaction if can't see floor and not rotating fast.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.MaxSpeedForRecoverableFall
member.summary: Sets the MaxSpeedForRecoverableFall setting for this . Character needs to be moving less than this speed to consider fall as a recoverable one.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.MinSpeedForBrace
member.summary: Sets the MinSpeedForBrace setting for this . Character needs to be moving at least this fast horizontally to start bracing for impact if there is an object along its trajectory.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.HighFallHelper.LandingNormal
member.summary: Sets the LandingNormal setting for this . Ray-cast normal doted with up direction has to be greater than this number to consider object flat enough to land on it.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StaggerTime
member.summary: Sets the StaggerTime setting for this . Max time for stumbling around before falling to ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StaggerLeanRate
member.summary: Sets the StaggerLeanRate setting for this . How quickly the character leans hips when staggering.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StumbleMaxLeanBack
member.summary: Sets the StumbleMaxLeanBack setting for this . max the character leans hips back when staggering.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.StumbleMaxLeanForward
member.summary: Sets the StumbleMaxLeanForward setting for this . max the character leans hips forwards when staggering.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.ArmsWindmillWritheBlend
member.summary: Sets the ArmsWindmillWritheBlend setting for this . Blend armsWindmill with the bodyWrithe arms when character is upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.SpineStumbleWritheBlend
member.summary: Sets the SpineStumbleWritheBlend setting for this . Blend spine stumble with the bodyWrithe spine when character is upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.LegsStumbleWritheBlend
member.summary: Sets the LegsStumbleWritheBlend setting for this . Blend legs stumble with the bodyWrithe legs when character is upright.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.ArmsPoseWritheBlend
member.summary: Sets the ArmsPoseWritheBlend setting for this . Blend the bodyWrithe arms with the current desired pose from on fire behaviour when character is on the floor.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.SpinePoseWritheBlend
member.summary: Sets the SpinePoseWritheBlend setting for this . Blend the bodyWrithe back with the current desired pose from on fire behaviour when character is on the floor.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.LegsPoseWritheBlend
member.summary: Sets the LegsPoseWritheBlend setting for this . Blend the bodyWrithe legs with the current desired pose from on fire behaviour when character is on the floor.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollOverFlag
member.summary: Sets the RollOverFlag setting for this . Flag to set bodyWrithe trying to rollOver.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollTorqueScale
member.summary: Sets the RollTorqueScale setting for this . Scale rolling torque that is applied to character spine by bodyWrithe. Torque magnitude is calculated with the following formula: m_rollOverDirection*rollOverPhase*rollTorqueScale.
member.remarks: Default value = 25.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 300.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.PredictTime
member.summary: Sets the PredictTime setting for this . Character pose depends on character facing direction that is evaluated from its COMTM orientation. Set this value to 0 to use no orientation prediction i.e. current character COMTM orientation will be used to determine character facing direction and finally the pose bodyWrithe is blending to. Set this value to GT 0 to predict character COMTM orientation this amout of time in seconds to the future.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.MaxRollOverTime
member.summary: Sets the MaxRollOverTime setting for this . Rolling torque is ramped down over time. At this time in seconds torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict time the character is rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 60.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.OnFireHelper.RollOverRadius
member.summary: Sets the RollOverRadius setting for this . Rolling torque is ramped down with distance measured from position where character hit the ground and started rolling. At this distance in meters torque value converges to zero. Use this parameter to restrict distance the character travels due to rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)

member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalRightLeg
member.summary: Sets the PedalRightLeg setting for this . pedal with this leg or not.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.BackPedal
member.summary: Sets the BackPedal setting for this . pedal forwards or backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Radius
member.summary: Sets the Radius setting for this . base radius of pedal action.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AngularSpeed
member.summary: Sets the AngularSpeed setting for this . rate of pedaling. If adaptivePedal4Dragging is true then the legsAngularSpeed calculated to match the linear speed of the character can have a maximum value of angularSpeed (this max used to be hard coded to 13.0).
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.LegStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LegStiffness setting for this . stiffness of legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.PedalOffset
member.summary: Sets the PedalOffset setting for this . Move the centre of the pedal for the left leg up by this amount, the right leg down by this amount.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.RandomSeed
member.summary: Sets the RandomSeed setting for this . Random seed used to generate speed changes.
member.remarks: Default value = 100. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.SpeedAsymmetry
member.summary: Sets the SpeedAsymmetry setting for this . Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronise the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AdaptivePedal4Dragging
member.summary: Sets the AdaptivePedal4Dragging setting for this . Will pedal in the direction of travel (if backPedal = false, against travel if backPedal = true) and with an angular velocity relative to speed upto a maximum of 13(rads/sec). Use when being dragged by a car. Overrides angularSpeed.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.AngSpeedMultiplier4Dragging
member.summary: Sets the AngSpeedMultiplier4Dragging setting for this . newAngularSpeed = Clamp(angSpeedMultiplier4Dragging * linear_speed/pedalRadius, 0.0, angularSpeed).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.RadiusVariance
member.summary: Sets the RadiusVariance setting for this . 0-1 value used to add variance to the radius value while pedalling, to desynchonize the legs' movement and provide some variety.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.LegAngleVariance
member.summary: Sets the LegAngleVariance setting for this . 0-1 value used to vary the angle of the legs from the hips during the pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreSideways
member.summary: Sets the CentreSideways setting for this . Move the centre of the pedal for both legs sideways (+ve = right). NB: not applied to hula.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreForwards
member.summary: Sets the CentreForwards setting for this . Move the centre of the pedal for both legs forward (or backward -ve).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.CentreUp
member.summary: Sets the CentreUp setting for this . Move the centre of the pedal for both legs up (or down -ve).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Ellipse
member.summary: Sets the Ellipse setting for this . Turn the circle into an ellipse. Ellipse has horizontal radius a and vertical radius b. If ellipse is +ve then a=radius*ellipse and b=radius. If ellipse is -ve then a=radius and b = radius*ellipse. 0.0 = vertical line of length 2*radius, 0.0:1.0 circle squashed horizontally (vertical radius = radius), 1.0=circle. -0.001 = horizontal line of length 2*radius, -0.0:-1.0 circle squashed vertically (horizontal radius = radius), -1.0 = circle.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.DragReduction
member.summary: Sets the DragReduction setting for this . how much to account for the target moving through space rather than being static.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Spread
member.summary: Sets the Spread setting for this . Spread legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PedalLegsHelper.Hula
member.summary: Sets the Hula setting for this . If true circle the legs in a hula motion.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: Sets the EnableLeft setting for this . Allow right hand to point/support?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.summary: Sets the LeftHandTarget setting for this . Target for the left Hand.

member.summary: Sets the LeftHandTargetIndex setting for this . Index of the object that the left hand target is specified in, -1 is world space.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeadTarget
member.summary: Sets the LeadTarget setting for this . NB: Only Applied to single handed weapons (some more work is required to have this tech on two handed weapons). Amount to lead target based on target velocity relative to the chest.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this . Stiffness of the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 14.0f. Min value = 2.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmStiffnessDetSupport
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffnessDetSupport setting for this . Stiffness of the arm on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 2.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Sets the ArmDamping setting for this . Damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.GravityOpposition
member.summary: Sets the GravityOpposition setting for this . Amount of gravity opposition on pointing arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.GravOppDetachedSupport
member.summary: Sets the GravOppDetachedSupport setting for this . Amount of gravity opposition on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MassMultDetachedSupport
member.summary: Sets the MassMultDetachedSupport setting for this . Amount of mass of weapon taken into account by gravity opposition on pointing arm when a support arm is detached from a two-handed weapon. The lower the value the more the character doesn't know about the weapon mass and therefore is more affected by it.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AllowShotLooseness
member.summary: Sets the AllowShotLooseness setting for this . Allow shot to set a lower arm muscleStiffness than pointGun normally would.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ClavicleBlend
member.summary: Sets the ClavicleBlend setting for this . How much of blend should come from incoming transforms 0(all IK) .. 1(all ITMs) For pointing arms only. (Support arm uses the IK solution as is for clavicles).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ElbowAttitude
member.summary: Sets the ElbowAttitude setting for this . Controls arm twist. (except in pistolIK).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.SupportConstraint
member.summary: Sets the SupportConstraint setting for this . Type of constraint between the support hand and gun. 0=no constraint, 1=hard distance constraint, 2=Force based constraint, 3=hard spherical constraint.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: Sets the ConstraintMinDistance setting for this . For supportConstraint = 1: Support hand constraint distance will be slowly reduced until it hits this value. This is for stability and also allows the pointing arm to lead a little. Don't set lower than NM_MIN_STABLE_DISTANCECONSTRAINT_DISTANCE 0.001f.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MakeConstraintDistance
member.summary: Sets the MakeConstraintDistance setting for this . For supportConstraint = 1: Minimum distance within which support hand constraint will be made.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ReduceConstraintLengthVel
member.summary: Sets the ReduceConstraintLengthVel setting for this . For supportConstraint = 1: Velocity at which to reduce the support hand constraint length.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BreakingStrength
member.summary: Sets the BreakingStrength setting for this . For supportConstraint = 1: strength of the supporting hands constraint (kg m/s), -1 to ignore/disable.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BrokenSupportTime
member.summary: Sets the BrokenSupportTime setting for this . Once constraint is broken then do not try to reconnect/support for this amount of time.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.BrokenToSideProb
member.summary: Sets the BrokenToSideProb setting for this . Probability that the when a constraint is broken that during brokenSupportTime a side pose will be selected.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConnectAfter
member.summary: Sets the ConnectAfter setting for this . If gunArm has been controlled by other behaviours for this time when it could have been pointing but couldn't due to pointing only allowed if connected, change gunArm pose to something that could connect for connectFor seconds.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConnectFor
member.summary: Sets the ConnectFor setting for this . Time to try to reconnect for.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.OneHandedPointing
member.summary: Sets the OneHandedPointing setting for this . 0 = don't allow, 1= allow for kPistol(two handed pistol) only, 2 = allow for kRifle only, 3 = allow for kPistol and kRifle. Allow one handed pointing - no constraint if cant be supported . If not allowed then gunHand does not try to point at target if it cannot be supported - the constraint will be controlled by always support.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AlwaysSupport
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysSupport setting for this . Support a non pointing gunHand i.e. if in zero pose (constrain as well if constraint possible).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedGunArm
member.summary: Sets the PoseUnusedGunArm setting for this . Apply neutral pose when a gun arm isn't in use. NB: at the moment Rifle hand is always controlled by pointGun.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedSupportArm
member.summary: Sets the PoseUnusedSupportArm setting for this . Apply neutral pose when a support arm isn't in use.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PoseUnusedOtherArm
member.summary: Sets the PoseUnusedOtherArm setting for this . Apply neutral pose to the non-gun arm (otherwise it is always under the control of other behaviours or not set). If the non-gun hand is a supporting hand it is not controlled by this parameter but by poseUnusedSupportArm.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MaxAngleAcross
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngleAcross setting for this . max aiming angle(deg) sideways across body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MaxAngleAway
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngleAway setting for this . max aiming angle(deg) sideways away from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingLimits
member.summary: Sets the FallingLimits setting for this . 0= don't apply limits. 1=apply the limits below only when the character is falling. 2 = always apply these limits (instead of applying maxAngleAcross and maxAngleAway which only limits the horizontal angle but implicity limits the updown (the limit shape is a vertical hinge).
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AcrossLimit
member.summary: Sets the AcrossLimit setting for this . max aiming angle(deg) sideways across body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point. i.e. for rightHanded gun this is the angle left of the midline.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.AwayLimit
member.summary: Sets the AwayLimit setting for this . max aiming angle(deg) sideways away from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point. i.e. for rightHanded gun this is the angle right of the midline.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UpLimit
member.summary: Sets the UpLimit setting for this . max aiming angle(deg) upwards from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DownLimit
member.summary: Sets the DownLimit setting for this . max aiming angle(deg) downwards from body midline measured from chest forward that the character will try to point.
member.remarks: Default value = 45.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 180.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleFall
member.summary: Sets the RifleFall setting for this . Pose the rifle hand to reduce complications with collisions. 0 = false, 1 = always when falling, 2 = when falling except if falling backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingSupport
member.summary: Sets the FallingSupport setting for this . Allow supporting of a rifle(or two handed pistol) when falling. 0 = false, 1 = support if allowed, 2 = support until constraint not active (don't allow support to restart), 3 = support until constraint not effective (support hand to support distance must be less than 0.15 - don't allow support to restart).
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FallingTypeSupport
member.summary: Sets the FallingTypeSupport setting for this . What is considered a fall by fallingSupport). Apply fallingSupport 0=never(will support if allowed), 1 = falling, 2 = falling except if falling backwards, 3 = falling and collided, 4 = falling and collided except if falling backwards, 5 = falling except if falling backwards until collided.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 5.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PistolNeutralType
member.summary: Sets the PistolNeutralType setting for this . 0 = byFace, 1=acrossFront, 2=bySide. NB: bySide is not connectible so be careful if combined with kPistol and oneHandedPointing = 0 or 2.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.NeutralPoint4Pistols
member.summary: Sets the NeutralPoint4Pistols setting for this . NOT IMPLEMENTED YET KEEP=false - use pointing for neutral targets in pistol modes.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.NeutralPoint4Rifle
member.summary: Sets the NeutralPoint4Rifle setting for this . use pointing for neutral targets in rifle mode.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.CheckNeutralPoint
member.summary: Sets the CheckNeutralPoint setting for this . Check the neutral pointing is pointable, if it isn't then choose a neutral pose instead.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.summary: Sets the Point2Connect setting for this . side, up, back) side is left for left arm, right for rght arm mmmmtodo.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.Add2WeaponDistConnect
member.summary: Sets the Add2WeaponDistConnect setting for this . add to weaponDistance for point2Connect neutral pointing (to straighten the arm).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.summary: Sets the UseSpineTwist setting for this . Use spine twist to orient chest?.

member.summary: Sets the UseTurnToTarget setting for this . Turn balancer to help gun point at target.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this . Use head look to drive head?.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ErrorThreshold
member.summary: Sets the ErrorThreshold setting for this . angular difference between pointing direction and target direction above which feedback will be generated.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxTime
member.summary: Sets the FireWeaponRelaxTime setting for this . Duration of arms relax following firing weapon. NB:This is clamped (0,5) in pointGun.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxAmount
member.summary: Sets the FireWeaponRelaxAmount setting for this . Relax multiplier following firing weapon. Recovers over relaxTime.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.FireWeaponRelaxDistance
member.summary: Sets the FireWeaponRelaxDistance setting for this . Range of motion for ik-based recoil.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.UseIncomingTransforms
member.summary: Sets the UseIncomingTransforms setting for this . Use the incoming transforms to inform the pointGun of the primaryWeaponDistance, poleVector for the arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.MeasureParentOffset
member.summary: Sets the MeasureParentOffset setting for this . If useIncomingTransforms = true and measureParentOffset=true then measure the Pointing-from offset from parent effector, using itms - this should point the barrel of the gun to the target. This is added to the rightHandParentOffset. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentOffset
member.summary: Sets the LeftHandParentOffset setting for this . Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.LeftHandParentEffector
member.summary: Sets the LeftHandParentEffector setting for this . 1 = Use leftShoulder. Effector from which the left hand pointing originates. ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentOffset
member.summary: Sets the RightHandParentOffset setting for this . Pointing-from offset from parent effector, expressed in spine3's frame, x = back/forward, y = right/left, z = up/down. This is added to the measured one if useIncomingTransforms=true and measureParentOffset=true. NB NOT used if rightHandParentEffector LT 0. Pistol(0,0,0) Rifle(0.0032, 0.0, -0.0).
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RightHandParentEffector
member.summary: Sets the RightHandParentEffector setting for this . 1 = Use rightShoulder.. Effector from which the right hand pointing originates. ie, point from this part to the target. -1 causes default offset for active weapon mode to be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1. Max value = 21.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.PrimaryHandWeaponDistance
member.summary: Sets the PrimaryHandWeaponDistance setting for this . Distance from the shoulder to hold the weapon. If -1 and useIncomingTransforms then weaponDistance is read from ITMs. weaponDistance=primaryHandWeaponDistance clamped [0.2f:m_maxArmReach=0.65] if useIncomingTransforms = false. pistol 0.60383, rifle 0.336.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.ConstrainRifle
member.summary: Sets the ConstrainRifle setting for this . Use hard constraint to keep rifle stock against shoulder?.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.RifleConstraintMinDistance
member.summary: Sets the RifleConstraintMinDistance setting for this . Rifle constraint distance. Deliberately kept large to create a flat constraint surface where rifle meets the shoulder.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableArmCollisions
member.summary: Sets the DisableArmCollisions setting for this . Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and the torso/legs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunHelper.DisableRifleCollisions
member.summary: Sets the DisableRifleCollisions setting for this . Disable collisions between right hand/forearm and spine3/spine2 if in rifle mode.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper
member.summary: Seldom set parameters for pointGun - just to keep number of parameters in any message less than or equal to 64.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the PointGunExtraHelper for sending a PointGunExtra to a given .
member.param: The to send the PointGunExtra to.
member.remarks: Seldom set parameters for pointGun - just to keep number of parameters in any message less than or equal to 64.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.ConstraintStrength
member.summary: Sets the ConstraintStrength setting for this . For supportConstraint = 2: force constraint strength of the supporting hands - it gets shaky at about 4.0.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.ConstraintThresh
member.summary: Sets the ConstraintThresh setting for this . For supportConstraint = 2: Like makeConstraintDistance. Force starts acting when the hands are LT 3.0*thresh apart but is maximum strength LT thresh. For comparison: 0.1 is used for reachForWound in shot, 0.25 is used in grab.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.WeaponMask
member.summary: Sets the WeaponMask setting for this . Currently unused - no intoWorldTest. RAGE bit mask to exclude weapons from ray probe - currently defaults to MP3 weapon flag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1024. Min value = 0.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.TimeWarpActive
member.summary: Sets the TimeWarpActive setting for this . Is timeWarpActive enabled?.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.TimeWarpStrengthScale
member.summary: Sets the TimeWarpStrengthScale setting for this . Scale for arm and helper strength when timewarp is enabled. 1 = normal compensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.OriStiff
member.summary: Sets the OriStiff setting for this . Hand stabilization controller stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.OriDamp
member.summary: Sets the OriDamp setting for this . Hand stabilization controller damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.PosStiff
member.summary: Sets the PosStiff setting for this . Hand stabilization controller stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.PointGunExtraHelper.PosDamp
member.summary: Sets the PosDamp setting for this . Hand stabilization controller damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the RollDownStairsHelper for sending a RollDownStairs to a given .
member.param: The to send the RollDownStairs to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Stiffness
member.summary: Sets the Stiffness setting for this . Effector Stiffness. value feeds through to rollUp directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Damping
member.summary: Sets the Damping setting for this . Effector Damping.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.Forcemag
member.summary: Sets the Forcemag setting for this . Helper force strength. Do not go above 1 for a rollDownStairs/roll along ground reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_useArmToSlowDown
member.summary: Sets the M_useArmToSlowDown setting for this . the degree to which the character will try to stop a barrel roll with his arms.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.9f. Min value = -3.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseZeroPose
member.summary: Sets the UseZeroPose setting for this . Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.SpinWhenInAir
member.summary: Sets the SpinWhenInAir setting for this . Applied cheat forces to spin the character when in the air, the forces are 40% of the forces applied when touching the ground. Be careful little bunny rabbits, the character could spin unnaturally in the air.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_armReachAmount
member.summary: Sets the M_armReachAmount setting for this . how much the character reaches with his arms to brace against the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.M_legPush
member.summary: Sets the M_legPush setting for this . amount that the legs push outwards when tumbling.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TryToAvoidHeadButtingGround
member.summary: Sets the TryToAvoidHeadButtingGround setting for this . Blends between a zeroPose and the Rollup, Faster the character is rotating the less the zeroPose.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ArmReachLength
member.summary: Sets the ArmReachLength setting for this . the length that the arm reaches and so how much it straightens.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.CustomRollDir
member.summary: Sets the CustomRollDir setting for this . pass in a custom direction in to have the character try and roll in that direction.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f). Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseCustomRollDir
member.summary: Sets the UseCustomRollDir setting for this . pass in true to use the customRollDir parameter.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTarget
member.summary: Sets the StiffnessDecayTarget setting for this . The target linear velocity used to start the rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 9.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.StiffnessDecayTime
member.summary: Sets the StiffnessDecayTime setting for this . time, in seconds, to decay stiffness down to the stiffnessDecayTarget value (or -1 to disable).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AsymmetricalLegs
member.summary: Sets the AsymmetricalLegs setting for this . 0 is no leg asymmetry in 'foetal' position. greater than 0 a asymmetricalLegs-rand(30%), added/minus each joint of the legs in radians. Random number changes about once every roll. 0.4 gives a lot of asymmetry.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Sets the ZAxisSpinReduction setting for this . Tries to reduce the spin around the z axis. Scale 0 - 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocityDecayTime
member.summary: Sets the TargetLinearVelocityDecayTime setting for this . Time for the targetlinearVelocity to decay to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.TargetLinearVelocity
member.summary: Sets the TargetLinearVelocity setting for this . Helper torques are applied to match the spin of the character to the max of targetLinearVelocity and COMVelMag.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.OnlyApplyHelperForces
member.summary: Sets the OnlyApplyHelperForces setting for this . Don't use rollup if true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseVelocityOfObjectBelow
member.summary: Sets the UseVelocityOfObjectBelow setting for this . scale applied cheat forces/torques to (zero) if object underneath character has velocity greater than 1.f.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.UseRelativeVelocity
member.summary: Sets the UseRelativeVelocity setting for this . useVelocityOfObjectBelow uses a relative velocity of the character to the object underneath.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyFoetalToLegs
member.summary: Sets the ApplyFoetalToLegs setting for this . if true, use rollup for upper body and a kind of foetal behavior for legs.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MovementLegsInFoetalPosition
member.summary: Sets the MovementLegsInFoetalPosition setting for this . Only used if applyFoetalToLegs = true : define the variation of angles for the joints of the legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MaxAngVelAroundFrontwardAxis
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngVelAroundFrontwardAxis setting for this . Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques or applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : maximal angular velocity around frontward axis of the pelvis to apply cheating torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MinAngVel
member.summary: Sets the MinAngVel setting for this . Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques or applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : minimal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyNewRollingCheatingTorques
member.summary: Sets the ApplyNewRollingCheatingTorques setting for this . if true will use the new way to apply cheating torques (like in fallOverWall), otherwise will use the old way.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MaxAngVel
member.summary: Sets the MaxAngVel setting for this . Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : maximal angular velocity of the roll to apply cheating torque.
member.remarks: Default value = 5.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MagOfTorqueToRoll
member.summary: Sets the MagOfTorqueToRoll setting for this . Only used if applyNewRollingCheatingTorques defined to true : magnitude of the torque to roll down the stairs.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 500.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyHelPerTorqueToAlign
member.summary: Sets the ApplyHelPerTorqueToAlign setting for this . apply torque to align the body orthogonally to the direction of the roll.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.DelayToAlignBody
member.summary: Sets the DelayToAlignBody setting for this . Only used if applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : delay to start to apply torques.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.MagOfTorqueToAlign
member.summary: Sets the MagOfTorqueToAlign setting for this . Only used if applyHelPerTorqueToAlign defined to true : magnitude of the torque to align orthogonally the body.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 500.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.AirborneReduction
member.summary: Sets the AirborneReduction setting for this . Ordinarily keep at 0.85. Make this lower if you want spinning in the air.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.ApplyMinMaxFriction
member.summary: Sets the ApplyMinMaxFriction setting for this . Pass-through to Roll Up. Controls whether or not behaviour enforces min/max friction.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.RollDownStairsHelper.LimitSpinReduction
member.summary: Sets the LimitSpinReduction setting for this . Scale zAxisSpinReduction back when rotating end-over-end (somersault) to give the body a chance to align with the axis of rotation.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotHelper for sending a Shot to a given .

member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of body. Feeds through to roll_up.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.SpineDamping
member.summary: Sets the SpineDamping setting for this . stiffness of body. Feeds through to roll_up.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this . arm stiffness.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.summary: Sets the InitialNeckStiffness setting for this . initial stiffness of neck after being shot.

member.summary: Sets the InitialNeckDamping setting for this . intial damping of neck after being shot.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.NeckStiffness
member.summary: Sets the NeckStiffness setting for this . stiffness of neck.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.NeckDamping
member.summary: Sets the NeckDamping setting for this . damping of neck.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.1f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.KMultOnLoose
member.summary: Sets the KMultOnLoose setting for this . how much to add to upperbody stiffness dependent on looseness.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.KMult4Legs
member.summary: Sets the KMult4Legs setting for this . how much to add to leg stiffnesses dependent on looseness.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.LoosenessAmount
member.summary: Sets the LoosenessAmount setting for this . how loose the character is made by a newBullet. between 0 and 1.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.Looseness4Fall
member.summary: Sets the Looseness4Fall setting for this . how loose the character is made by a newBullet if falling.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.Looseness4Stagger
member.summary: Sets the Looseness4Stagger setting for this . how loose the upperBody of the character is made by a newBullet if staggerFall is running (and not falling). Note atm the neck ramp values are ignored in staggerFall.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.MinArmsLooseness
member.summary: Sets the MinArmsLooseness setting for this . minimum looseness to apply to the arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.MinLegsLooseness
member.summary: Sets the MinLegsLooseness setting for this . minimum looseness to apply to the Legs.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.GrabHoldTime
member.summary: Sets the GrabHoldTime setting for this . how long to hold for before returning to relaxed arm position.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.SpineBlendExagCPain
member.summary: Sets the SpineBlendExagCPain setting for this . true: spine is blended with zero pose, false: spine is blended with zero pose if not setting exag or cpain.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.SpineBlendZero
member.summary: Sets the SpineBlendZero setting for this . spine is always blended with zero pose this much and up to 1 as the character become stationary. If negative no blend is ever applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = -0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.BulletProofVest
member.summary: Sets the BulletProofVest setting for this . looseness applied to spine is different if bulletProofVest is true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AlwaysResetLooseness
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysResetLooseness setting for this . looseness always reset on shotNewBullet even if previous looseness ramp still running. Except for the neck which has it's own ramp.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AlwaysResetNeckLooseness
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysResetNeckLooseness setting for this . Neck looseness always reset on shotNewBullet even if previous looseness ramp still running.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AngVelScale
member.summary: Sets the AngVelScale setting for this . How much to scale the angular velocity coming in from animation of a part if it is in angVelScaleMask (otherwise scale by 1.0).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.AngVelScaleMask
member.summary: Sets the AngVelScaleMask setting for this . Parts to scale the initial angular velocity by angVelScale (otherwize scale by 1.0).
member.remarks: Default value = fb.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.FlingWidth
member.summary: Sets the FlingWidth setting for this . Width of the fling behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.FlingTime
member.summary: Sets the FlingTime setting for this . Duration of the fling behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.TimeBeforeReachForWound
member.summary: Sets the TimeBeforeReachForWound setting for this . time, in seconds, before the character begins to grab for the wound on the first hit.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagDuration
member.summary: Sets the ExagDuration setting for this . exaggerate bullet duration (at exagMag/exagTwistMag).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagMag
member.summary: Sets the ExagMag setting for this . exaggerate bullet spine Lean magnitude.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHelper.ExagTwistMag
member.summary: Sets the ExagTwistMag setting for this . exaggerate bullet spine Twist magnitude.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper
member.summary: configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotShockSpinHelper for sending a ShotShockSpin to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotShockSpin to.
member.remarks: configure the shockSpin effect in shot. Spin/Lift the character using cheat torques/forces.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AddShockSpin
member.summary: Sets the AddShockSpin setting for this . if enabled, add a short 'shock' of torque to the character's spine to exaggerate bullet impact.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.RandomizeShockSpinDirection
member.summary: Sets the RandomizeShockSpinDirection setting for this . for use with close-range shotgun blasts, or similar.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.AlwaysAddShockSpin
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysAddShockSpin setting for this . if true, apply the shock spin no matter which body component was hit. otherwise only apply if the spine or clavicles get hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMin
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinMin setting for this . minimum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 50.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMax
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinMax setting for this . maxiumum amount of torque to add if using shock-spin feature.
member.remarks: Default value = 90.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinLiftForceMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinLiftForceMult setting for this . if greater than 0, apply a force to lift the character up while the torque is applied, trying to produce a dramatic spun/twist shotgun-to-the-chest effect. this is a scale of the torque applied, so 8.0 or so would give a reasonable amount of lift.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinDecayMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinDecayMult setting for this . multiplier used when decaying torque spin over time.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScalePerComponent
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinScalePerComponent setting for this . torque applied is scaled by this amount across the spine components - spine2 recieving the full amount, then 3 and 1 and finally 0. each time, this value is used to scale it down. 0.5 means half the torque each time.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinMaxTwistVel
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinMaxTwistVel setting for this . shock spin ends when twist velocity is greater than this value (try 6.0). If set to -1 does not stop.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 200.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinScaleByLeverArm
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinScaleByLeverArm setting for this . shock spin scales by lever arm of bullet i.e. bullet impact point to centre line.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinAirMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinAirMult setting for this . shockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when both the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpin1FootMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpin1FootMult setting for this . shockSpin's torque is multipied by this value when the one of the character's feet are not in contact.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.ShockSpinFootGripMult
member.summary: Sets the ShockSpinFootGripMult setting for this . shockSpin scales the torques applied to the feet by footSlipCompensation.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotShockSpinHelper.BracedSideSpinMult
member.summary: Sets the BracedSideSpinMult setting for this . If shot on a side with a forward foot and both feet are on the ground and balanced, increase the shockspin to compensate for the balancer naturally resisting spin to that side.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.
