member.summary: configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotFallToKneesHelper for sending a ShotFallToKnees to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotFallToKnees to.
member.remarks: configure the fall to knees shot.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FallToKnees
member.summary: Sets the FallToKnees setting for this . Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkAlwaysChangeFall
member.summary: Sets the FtkAlwaysChangeFall setting for this . Always change fall behaviour. If false only change when falling forward.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceTime
member.summary: Sets the FtkBalanceTime setting for this . How long the balancer runs for before fallToKnees starts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForce
member.summary: Sets the FtkHelperForce setting for this . Hip helper force magnitude - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes.
member.remarks: Default value = 200.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHelperForceOnSpine
member.summary: Sets the FtkHelperForceOnSpine setting for this . Helper force applied to spine3 aswell.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLeanHelp
member.summary: Sets the FtkLeanHelp setting for this . Help balancer lean amount - to help character lean over balance point of line between toes. Half of this is also applied as hipLean.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkSpineBend
member.summary: Sets the FtkSpineBend setting for this . Bend applied to spine when falling from knees. (+ve forward - try -0.1) (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -0.2f. Max value = 0.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkStiffSpine
member.summary: Sets the FtkStiffSpine setting for this . Stiffen spine when falling from knees (only if rds called).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLooseness
member.summary: Sets the FtkImpactLooseness setting for this . Looseness (muscleStiffness = 1.01f - m_parameters.ftkImpactLooseness) applied to upperBody on knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkImpactLoosenessTime
member.summary: Sets the FtkImpactLoosenessTime setting for this . Time that looseness is applied after knee impacts.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -0.1f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBendRate
member.summary: Sets the FtkBendRate setting for this . Rate at which the legs are bent to go from standing to on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipBlend
member.summary: Sets the FtkHipBlend setting for this . Blend from current hip to balancing on knees hip angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkLungeProb
member.summary: Sets the FtkLungeProb setting for this . Probability that a lunge reaction will be allowed.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkKneeSpin
member.summary: Sets the FtkKneeSpin setting for this . When on knees allow some spinning of the character. If false then the balancers' footSlipCompensation remains on and tends to keep the character facing the same way as when it was balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFricMult
member.summary: Sets the FtkFricMult setting for this . Multiplier on the reduction of friction for the feet based on angle away from horizontal - helps the character fall to knees quicker.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkHipAngleFall
member.summary: Sets the FtkHipAngleFall setting for this . Apply this hip angle when the character starts to fall backwards when on knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchForwards
member.summary: Sets the FtkPitchForwards setting for this . Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling forwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkPitchBackwards
member.summary: Sets the FtkPitchBackwards setting for this . Hip pitch applied (+ve forward, -ve backwards) if character is falling backwards on way down to it's knees.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -0.5f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFallBelowStab
member.summary: Sets the FtkFallBelowStab setting for this . Balancer instability below which the character starts to bend legs even if it isn't going to fall on to it's knees (i.e. if going backwards). 0.3 almost ensures a fall to knees but means the character will keep stepping backward until it slows down enough.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkBalanceAbortThreshold
member.summary: Sets the FtkBalanceAbortThreshold setting for this . when the character gives up and goes into a fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 4.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkOnKneesArmType
member.summary: Sets the FtkOnKneesArmType setting for this . Type of arm response when on knees falling forward 0=useFallArms (from RollDownstairs or catchFall), 1= armsIn, 2=armsOut.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleaseReachForWound
member.summary: Sets the FtkReleaseReachForWound setting for this . Release the reachForWound this amount of time after the knees have hit. If LT 0.0 then keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReachForWound
member.summary: Sets the FtkReachForWound setting for this . true = Keep reaching for wound regardless of fall/onground state. false = respect the shotConfigureArms params: reachFalling, reachFallingWithOneHand, reachOnFloor.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkReleasePointGun
member.summary: Sets the FtkReleasePointGun setting for this . Override the pointGun when knees hit.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotFallToKneesHelper.FtkFailMustCollide
member.summary: Sets the FtkFailMustCollide setting for this . The upper body of the character must be colliding and other failure conditions met to fail.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHeadLookHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this . Use headLook. Default: looks at provided target or if this is zero - looks forward or in velocity direction. If reachForWound is enabled, switches between looking at the wound and at the default target.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotHeadLookHelper.HeadLook
member.summary: Sets the HeadLook setting for this . position to look at with headlook flag.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper
member.summary: configure the arm reactions in shot.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the ShotConfigureArmsHelper for sending a ShotConfigureArms to a given .
member.param: The to send the ShotConfigureArms to.
member.remarks: configure the arm reactions in shot.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Brace
member.summary: Sets the Brace setting for this . blind brace with arms if appropriate.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.PointGun
member.summary: Sets the PointGun setting for this . Point gun if appropriate.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.UseArmsWindmill
member.summary: Sets the UseArmsWindmill setting for this . armsWindmill if going backwards fast enough.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReleaseWound
member.summary: Sets the ReleaseWound setting for this . release wound if going sideways/forward fast enough. 0 = don't. 1 = only if bracing. 2 = any default arm reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachFalling
member.summary: Sets the ReachFalling setting for this . reachForWound when falling 0 = false, 1 = true, 2 = once per shot performance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachFallingWithOneHand
member.summary: Sets the ReachFallingWithOneHand setting for this . Force character to reach for wound with only one hand when falling or fallen. 0= allow 2 handed reach, 1= left only if 2 handed possible, 2= right only if 2 handed possible, 3 = one handed but automatic (allows switching of hands).
member.remarks: Default value = 3. Min value = 0. Max value = 3.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachOnFloor
member.summary: Sets the ReachOnFloor setting for this . reachForWound when on floor - 0 = false, 1 = true, 2 = once per shot performance.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AlwaysReachTime
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysReachTime setting for this . Inhibit arms brace for this amount of time after reachForWound has begun.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AWSpeedMult
member.summary: Sets the AWSpeedMult setting for this . For armsWindmill, multiplier on character speed - increase of speed of circling is proportional to character speed (max speed of circliing increase = 1.5). eg. lowering the value increases the range of velocity that the 0-1.5 is applied over.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AWRadiusMult
member.summary: Sets the AWRadiusMult setting for this . For armsWindmill, multiplier on character speed - increase of radii is proportional to character speed (max radius increase = 0.45). eg. lowering the value increases the range of velocity that the 0-0.45 is applied over.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AWStiffnessAdd
member.summary: Sets the AWStiffnessAdd setting for this . For armsWindmill, added arm stiffness ranges from 0 to AWStiffnessAdd.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.ReachWithOneHand
member.summary: Sets the ReachWithOneHand setting for this . Force character to reach for wound with only one hand. 0= allow 2 handed reach, 1= left only if 2 handed possible, 2= right only if 2 handed possible.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AllowLeftPistolRFW
member.summary: Sets the AllowLeftPistolRFW setting for this . Allow character to reach for wound with left hand if holding a pistol. It never will for a rifle. If pointGun is running this will only happen if the hand cannot point and pointGun:poseUnusedGunArm = false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.AllowRightPistolRFW
member.summary: Sets the AllowRightPistolRFW setting for this . Allow character to reach for wound with right hand if holding a pistol. It never will for a rifle. If pointGun is running this will only happen if the hand cannot point and pointGun:poseUnusedGunArm = false.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.RfwWithPistol
member.summary: Sets the RfwWithPistol setting for this . Override pointGun and reachForWound if desired if holding a pistol. It never will for a rifle.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2
member.summary: Sets the Fling2 setting for this . Type of reaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2Left
member.summary: Sets the Fling2Left setting for this . Fling the left arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2Right
member.summary: Sets the Fling2Right setting for this . Fling the right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2OverrideStagger
member.summary: Sets the Fling2OverrideStagger setting for this . Override stagger arms even if staggerFall:m_upperBodyReaction = true.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2TimeBefore
member.summary: Sets the Fling2TimeBefore setting for this . Time after hit that the fling will start (allows for a bit of loose arm movement from bullet impact.snap etc).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2Time
member.summary: Sets the Fling2Time setting for this . Duration of the fling behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2MStiffL
member.summary: Sets the Fling2MStiffL setting for this . MuscleStiffness of the left arm. If negative then uses the shots underlying muscle stiffness from controlStiffness (i.e. respects looseness).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2MStiffR
member.summary: Sets the Fling2MStiffR setting for this . MuscleStiffness of the right arm. If negative then uses the shots underlying muscle stiffness from controlStiffness (i.e. respects looseness).
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2RelaxTimeL
member.summary: Sets the Fling2RelaxTimeL setting for this . Maximum time before the left arm relaxes in the fling. It will relax automatically when the arm has completed it's bent arm fling. This is what causes the arm to straighten.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2RelaxTimeR
member.summary: Sets the Fling2RelaxTimeR setting for this . Maximum time before the right arm relaxes in the fling. It will relax automatically when the arm has completed it's bent arm fling. This is what causes the arm to straighten.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMinL
member.summary: Sets the Fling2AngleMinL setting for this . Min fling angle for left arm. Fling angle is random in the range fling2AngleMin:fling2AngleMax. Angle of fling in radians measured from the body horizontal sideways from shoulder. positive is up, 0 shoulder level, negative down.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.5f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMaxL
member.summary: Sets the Fling2AngleMaxL setting for this . Max fling angle for left arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMinR
member.summary: Sets the Fling2AngleMinR setting for this . Min fling angle for right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.5f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2AngleMaxR
member.summary: Sets the Fling2AngleMaxR setting for this . Max fling angle for right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = -1.5f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMinL
member.summary: Sets the Fling2LengthMinL setting for this . Min left arm length. Armlength is random in the range fling2LengthMin:fling2LengthMax. Armlength maps one to one with elbow angle. (These values are scaled internally for the female character).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMaxL
member.summary: Sets the Fling2LengthMaxL setting for this . Max left arm length.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMinR
member.summary: Sets the Fling2LengthMinR setting for this . Min right arm length.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Fling2LengthMaxR
member.summary: Sets the Fling2LengthMaxR setting for this . Max right arm length.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.3f. Max value = 0.6f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.Bust
member.summary: Sets the Bust setting for this . Has the character got a bust. If so then cupBust (move bust reach targets below bust) or bustElbowLift and cupSize (stop upperArm penetrating bust and move bust targets to surface of bust) are implemented.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.BustElbowLift
member.summary: Sets the BustElbowLift setting for this . Lift the elbows up this much extra to avoid upper arm penetrating the bust (when target hits spine2 or spine3).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.CupSize
member.summary: Sets the CupSize setting for this . Amount reach target to bust (spine2) will be offset forward by.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.ShotConfigureArmsHelper.CupBust
member.summary: Sets the CupBust setting for this . All reach targets above or on the bust will cause a reach below the bust. (specifically moves spine3 and spine2 targets to spine1). bustElbowLift and cupSize are ignored.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: T:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper
member.summary: Clone of High Fall with a wider range of operating conditions.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the SmartFallHelper for sending a SmartFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the SmartFall to.
member.remarks: Clone of High Fall with a wider range of operating conditions.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.BodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of body. Value feeds through to bodyBalance (synched with defaults), to armsWindmill (14 for this value at default ), legs pedal, head look and roll down stairs directly.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Bodydamping
member.summary: Sets the Bodydamping setting for this . The damping of the joints.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 3.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Catchfalltime
member.summary: Sets the Catchfalltime setting for this . The length of time before the impact that the character transitions to the landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.CrashOrLandCutOff
member.summary: Sets the CrashOrLandCutOff setting for this . 0.52angle is 0.868 dot//A threshold for deciding how far away from upright the character needs to be before bailing out (going into a foetal) instead of trying to land (keeping stretched out). NB: never does bailout if ignorWorldCollisions true.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.PdStrength
member.summary: Sets the PdStrength setting for this . Strength of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.PdDamping
member.summary: Sets the PdDamping setting for this . Damping multiplier of the controller to keep the character at angle aimAngleBase from vertical. The actual damping is pdDamping*pdStrength*constant*angVel.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmAngSpeed
member.summary: Sets the ArmAngSpeed setting for this . arm circling speed in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmAmplitude
member.summary: Sets the ArmAmplitude setting for this . in armWindMillAdaptive.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmPhase
member.summary: Sets the ArmPhase setting for this . in armWindMillAdaptive 3.1 opposite for stuntman. 1.0 old default. 0.0 in phase.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.3f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmBendElbows
member.summary: Sets the ArmBendElbows setting for this . in armWindMillAdaptive bend the elbows as a function of armAngle. For stuntman true otherwise false.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegRadius
member.summary: Sets the LegRadius setting for this . radius of legs on pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 0.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegAngSpeed
member.summary: Sets the LegAngSpeed setting for this . in pedal.
member.remarks: Default value = 7.9f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 15.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegAsymmetry
member.summary: Sets the LegAsymmetry setting for this . 0.0 for stuntman. Random offset applied per leg to the angular speed to desynchronise the pedaling - set to 0 to disable, otherwise should be set to less than the angularSpeed value.
member.remarks: Default value = 4.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Arms2LegsPhase
member.summary: Sets the Arms2LegsPhase setting for this . phase angle between the arms and legs circling angle.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 6.5f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Arms2LegsSync
member.summary: Sets the Arms2LegsSync setting for this . Syncs the arms angle to what the leg angle is.
member.remarks: Default value = . All speed/direction parameters of armswindmill are overwritten if = . If and you want synced arms/legs then armAngSpeed=legAngSpeed, legAsymmetry = 0.0 (to stop randomizations of the leg cicle speed).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ArmsUp
member.summary: Sets the ArmsUp setting for this . Where to put the arms when preparing to land. Approx 1 = above head, 0 = head height, -1 = down. LT -2.0 use catchFall arms, LT -3.0 use prepare for landing pose if Agent is due to land vertically, feet first.
member.remarks: Default value = -3.1f. Min value = -4.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.OrientateBodyToFallDirection
member.summary: Sets the OrientateBodyToFallDirection setting for this . toggle to orientate to fall direction. i.e. orientate so that the character faces the horizontal velocity direction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.OrientateTwist
member.summary: Sets the OrientateTwist setting for this . If false don't worry about the twist angle of the character when orientating the character. If false this allows the twist axis of the character to be free (You can get a nice twisting highFall like the one in dieHard 4 when the car goes into the helicopter).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.OrientateMax
member.summary: Sets the OrientateMax setting for this . DEVEL parameter - suggest you don't edit it. Maximum torque the orientation controller can apply. If 0 then no helper torques will be used. 300 will orientate the character soflty for all but extreme angles away from aimAngleBase. If abs (current -aimAngleBase) is getting near 3.0 then this can be reduced to give a softer feel.
member.remarks: Default value = 300.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2000.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.AlanRickman
member.summary: Sets the AlanRickman setting for this . If true then orientate the character to face the point from where it started falling. HighFall like the one in dieHard with Alan Rickman.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FowardRoll
member.summary: Sets the FowardRoll setting for this . Try to execute a forward Roll on landing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll
member.summary: Sets the UseZeroPose_withFowardRoll setting for this . Blend to a zero pose when forward roll is attempted.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.AimAngleBase
member.summary: Sets the AimAngleBase setting for this . Angle from vertical the pdController is driving to ( positive = forwards).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -3.1f. Max value = 3.1f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FowardVelRotation
member.summary: Sets the FowardVelRotation setting for this . scale to add/subtract from aimAngle based on forward speed (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FootVelCompScale
member.summary: Sets the FootVelCompScale setting for this . Scale to change to amount of vel that is added to the foot ik from the velocity (Internal).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.SideD
member.summary: Sets the SideD setting for this . sideoffset for the feet during prepareForLanding. +ve = right.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.FowardOffsetOfLegIK
member.summary: Sets the FowardOffsetOfLegIK setting for this . Forward offset for the feet during prepareForLanding.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegL
member.summary: Sets the LegL setting for this . Leg Length for ik (Internal)//unused.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.CatchFallCutOff
member.summary: Sets the CatchFallCutOff setting for this . 0.5angle is 0.878 dot. Cutoff to go to the catchFall ( internal) //mmmtodo do like crashOrLandCutOff.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.9f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LegStrength
member.summary: Sets the LegStrength setting for this . Strength of the legs at landing.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Balance
member.summary: Sets the Balance setting for this . If true have enough strength to balance. If false not enough strength in legs to balance (even though bodyBlance called).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.IgnorWorldCollisions
member.summary: Sets the IgnorWorldCollisions setting for this . Never go into bailout (foetal).
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.AdaptiveCircling
member.summary: Sets the AdaptiveCircling setting for this . stuntman type fall. Arm and legs circling direction controlled by angmom and orientation.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Hula
member.summary: Sets the Hula setting for this . With stuntman type fall. Hula reaction if can't see floor and not rotating fast.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.MaxSpeedForRecoverableFall
member.summary: Sets the MaxSpeedForRecoverableFall setting for this . Character needs to be moving less than this speed to consider fall as a recoverable one.
member.remarks: Default value = 15.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.MinSpeedForBrace
member.summary: Sets the MinSpeedForBrace setting for this . Character needs to be moving at least this fast horizontally to start bracing for impact if there is an object along its trajectory.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.LandingNormal
member.summary: Sets the LandingNormal setting for this . Ray-cast normal doted with up direction has to be greater than this number to consider object flat enough to land on it.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.6f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsForceMag
member.summary: Sets the RdsForceMag setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 0.8f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsTargetLinVeDecayTime
member.summary: Sets the RdsTargetLinVeDecayTime setting for this . RDS: Time for the targetlinearVelocity to decay to zero.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsTargetLinearVelocity
member.summary: Sets the RdsTargetLinearVelocity setting for this . RDS: Helper torques are applied to match the spin of the character to the max of targetLinearVelocity and COMVelMag. -1 to use initial character velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 30.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsUseStartingFriction
member.summary: Sets the RdsUseStartingFriction setting for this . Start Catch Fall/RDS state with specified friction. Catch fall will overwrite based on setFallingReaction.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsStartingFriction
member.summary: Sets the RdsStartingFriction setting for this . Catch Fall/RDS starting friction. Catch fall will overwrite based on setFallingReaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsStartingFrictionMin
member.summary: Sets the RdsStartingFrictionMin setting for this . Catch Fall/RDS starting friction minimum. Catch fall will overwrite based on setFallingReaction.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.RdsForceVelThreshold
member.summary: Sets the RdsForceVelThreshold setting for this . Velocity threshold under which RDS force mag will be applied.
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.InitialState
member.summary: Sets the InitialState setting for this . Force initial state (used in vehicle bail out to start SF_CatchFall (6) earlier.
member.remarks: Default value = 0. Min value = 0. Max value = 7.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ChangeExtremityFriction
member.summary: Sets the ChangeExtremityFriction setting for this . Allow friction changes to be applied to the hands and feet.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.Teeter
member.summary: Sets the Teeter setting for this . Set up an immediate teeter in the direction of trave if initial state is SF_Balance.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.TeeterOffset
member.summary: Sets the TeeterOffset setting for this . Offset the default Teeter edge in the direction of travel. Will need to be tweaked depending on how close to the real edge AI tends to trigger the behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.StopRollingTime
member.summary: Sets the StopRollingTime setting for this . Time in seconds before ped should start actively trying to stop rolling.
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ReboundScale
member.summary: Sets the ReboundScale setting for this . Scale for rebound assistance. 0=off, 1=very bouncy, 2=jbone crazy Try 0.5?.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ReboundMask
member.summary: Sets the ReboundMask setting for this . Part mask to apply rebound assistance.
member.remarks: Default value = uk.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.ForceHeadAvoid
member.summary: Sets the ForceHeadAvoid setting for this . Force head avoid to be active during Catch Fall even when character is not on the ground.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.CfZAxisSpinReduction
member.summary: Sets the CfZAxisSpinReduction setting for this . Pass-through parameter for Catch Fall spin reduction. Increase to stop more spin. 0..1.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.SplatWhenStopped
member.summary: Sets the SplatWhenStopped setting for this . Transition to splat state when com vel is below value, regardless of character health or fall velocity. Set to zero to disable.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.BlendHeadWhenStopped
member.summary: Sets the BlendHeadWhenStopped setting for this . Blend head to neutral pose com vel approaches zero. Linear between zero and value. Set to zero to disable.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.SmartFallHelper.SpreadLegs
member.summary: Sets the SpreadLegs setting for this . Spread legs amount for Pedal during fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the StaggerFallHelper for sending a StaggerFall to a given .
member.param: The to send the StaggerFall to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffness setting for this . stiffness of arms. catch_fall's stiffness scales with this value, but has default values when this is default.
member.remarks: Default value = 12.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmDamping
member.summary: Sets the ArmDamping setting for this . Sets damping value for the arms.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineDamping
member.summary: Sets the SpineDamping setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineStiffness
member.summary: Sets the SpineStiffness setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = 10.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmStiffnessStart
member.summary: Sets the ArmStiffnessStart setting for this . armStiffness during the yanked timescale ie timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.ArmDampingStart
member.summary: Sets the ArmDampingStart setting for this . armDamping during the yanked timescale ie timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineDampingStart
member.summary: Sets the SpineDampingStart setting for this . spineDamping during the yanked timescale ie timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineStiffnessStart
member.summary: Sets the SpineStiffnessStart setting for this . spineStiffness during the yanked timescale ie timeAtStartValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 3.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TimeAtStartValues
member.summary: Sets the TimeAtStartValues setting for this . time spent with Start values for arms and spine stiffness and damping ie for whiplash efffect.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.RampTimeFromStartValues
member.summary: Sets the RampTimeFromStartValues setting for this . time spent ramping from Start to end values for arms and spine stiffness and damping ie for whiplash efffect (occurs after timeAtStartValues).
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.StaggerStepProb
member.summary: Sets the StaggerStepProb setting for this . Probability per step of time spent in a stagger step.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.StepsTillStartEnd
member.summary: Sets the StepsTillStartEnd setting for this . steps taken before lowerBodyStiffness starts ramping down by perStepReduction1.
member.remarks: Default value = 2. Min value = 0. Max value = 100.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.TimeStartEnd
member.summary: Sets the TimeStartEnd setting for this . time from start of behaviour before lowerBodyStiffness starts ramping down for rampTimeToEndValues to endValues.
member.remarks: Default value = 100.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 100.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.RampTimeToEndValues
member.summary: Sets the RampTimeToEndValues setting for this . time spent ramping from lowerBodyStiffness to lowerBodyStiffnessEnd.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LowerBodyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the LowerBodyStiffness setting for this . lowerBodyStiffness should be 12.
member.remarks: Default value = 13.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LowerBodyStiffnessEnd
member.summary: Sets the LowerBodyStiffnessEnd setting for this . lowerBodyStiffness at end.
member.remarks: Default value = 8.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.PredictionTime
member.summary: Sets the PredictionTime setting for this . amount of time (seconds) into the future that the character tries to step to. bigger values try to recover with fewer, bigger steps. smaller values recover with smaller steps, and generally recover less.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.PerStepReduction1
member.summary: Sets the PerStepReduction1 setting for this . LowerBody stiffness will be reduced every step to make the character fallover.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.7f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanInDirRate
member.summary: Sets the LeanInDirRate setting for this . leanInDirection will be increased from 0 to leanInDirMax linearly at this rate.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanInDirMaxF
member.summary: Sets the LeanInDirMaxF setting for this . Max of leanInDirection magnitude when going forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanInDirMaxB
member.summary: Sets the LeanInDirMaxB setting for this . Max of leanInDirection magnitude when going backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.3f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanHipsMaxF
member.summary: Sets the LeanHipsMaxF setting for this . Max of leanInDirectionHips magnitude when going forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.LeanHipsMaxB
member.summary: Sets the LeanHipsMaxB setting for this . Max of leanInDirectionHips magnitude when going backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.Lean2multF
member.summary: Sets the Lean2multF setting for this . Lean of spine to side in side velocity direction when going forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = -1.0f. Min value = -5.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.Lean2multB
member.summary: Sets the Lean2multB setting for this . Lean of spine to side in side velocity direction when going backwards.
member.remarks: Default value = -2.0f. Min value = -5.0f. Max value = 5.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.PushOffDist
member.summary: Sets the PushOffDist setting for this . amount stance foot is behind com in the direction of velocity before the leg tries to pushOff to increase momentum. Increase to lower the probability of the pushOff making the character bouncy.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.2f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.MaxPushoffVel
member.summary: Sets the MaxPushoffVel setting for this . stance leg will only pushOff to increase momentum if the vertical hip velocity is less than this value. 0.4 seems like a good value. The higher it is the the less this functionality is applied. If it is very low or negative this can stop the pushOff altogether.
member.remarks: Default value = 20.0f. Min value = -20.0f. Max value = 20.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HipBendMult
member.summary: Sets the HipBendMult setting for this . hipBend scaled with velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.0f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.AlwaysBendForwards
member.summary: Sets the AlwaysBendForwards setting for this . bend forwards at the hip (hipBendMult) whether moving backwards or forwards.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.SpineBendMult
member.summary: Sets the SpineBendMult setting for this . spine bend scaled with velocity.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.4f. Min value = -10.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this . enable and provide a look-at target to make the character's head turn to face it while balancing, balancer default is 0.2.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HeadLookPos
member.summary: Sets the HeadLookPos setting for this . position of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HeadLookInstanceIndex
member.summary: Sets the HeadLookInstanceIndex setting for this . level index of thing to look at.
member.remarks: Default value = -1. Min value = -1.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.HeadLookAtVelProb

member.summary: Sets the TurnLeftProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning left. This is one of six turn type weights.

member.summary: Sets the TurnRightProb setting for this . Weighted Probability of turning right. This is one of six turn type weights.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.UseBodyTurn
member.summary: Sets the UseBodyTurn setting for this . enable and provide a positive bodyTurnTimeout and provide a look-at target to make the character turn to face it while balancing.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.StaggerFallHelper.UpperBodyReaction
member.summary: Sets the UpperBodyReaction setting for this . enable upper body reaction ie blindBrace and armswindmill.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: M:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.#ctor(CitizenFX.FiveM.Ped)
member.summary: Creates a new Instance of the TeeterHelper for sending a Teeter to a given .
member.param: The to send the Teeter to.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.EdgeLeft
member.summary: Sets the EdgeLeft setting for this . Defines the left edge point (left of character facing edge).

member.summary: Sets the EdgeRight setting for this . Defines the right edge point (right of character facing edge).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.UseExclusionZone
member.summary: Sets the UseExclusionZone setting for this . stop stepping across the line defined by edgeLeft and edgeRight.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this .
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.CallHighFall
member.summary: Sets the CallHighFall setting for this . call highFall if fallen over the edge. If false just call blended writhe (to go over the top of the fall behaviour of the underlying behaviour e.g. bodyBalance).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.LeanAway
member.summary: Sets the LeanAway setting for this . lean away from the edge based on velocity towards the edge (if closer than 2m from edge).
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.PreTeeterTime
member.summary: Sets the PreTeeterTime setting for this . Time-to-edge threshold to start pre-teeter (windmilling, etc).
member.remarks: Default value = 2.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.LeanAwayTime
member.summary: Sets the LeanAwayTime setting for this . Time-to-edge threshold to start leaning away from a potential fall.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.LeanAwayScale
member.summary: Sets the LeanAwayScale setting for this . Scales stay upright lean and hip pitch.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.5f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.TeeterHelper.TeeterTime
member.summary: Sets the TeeterTime setting for this . Time-to-edge threshold to start full-on teeter (more aggressive lean, drop-and-twist, etc).
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 10.0f.

member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.summary: Sets the BodyStiffness setting for this . stiffness of body. Value carries over to head look, spine twist.
member.remarks: Default value = 11.0f. Min value = 6.0f. Max value = 16.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.BodyDamping
member.summary: Sets the BodyDamping setting for this . damping value used for upper body.
member.remarks: Default value = 1.0f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 2.0f.

member.summary: Sets the BackBendAmount setting for this . Amount to bend the back during the flinch.
member.remarks: Default value = -0.6f. Min value = -1.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.summary: Sets the UseRightArm setting for this . Toggle to use the right arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.UseLeftArm
member.summary: Sets the UseLeftArm setting for this . Toggle to Use the Left arm.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.NoiseScale
member.summary: Sets the NoiseScale setting for this . Amplitude of the perlin noise applied to the arms positions in the flicnh to the front part of the behaviour.
member.remarks: Default value = 0.1f. Min value = 0.0f. Max value = 1.0f.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.NewHit
member.summary: Sets the NewHit setting for this . Relaxes the character for 1 frame if set.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.ProtectHeadToggle
member.summary: Sets the ProtectHeadToggle setting for this . Always protect head. Note if false then character flinches if target is in front, protects head if target is behind.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.DontBraceHead
member.summary: Sets the DontBraceHead setting for this . don't protect head only brace from front. Turned on by bcr.
member.remarks: Default value = False.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.ApplyStiffness
member.summary: Sets the ApplyStiffness setting for this . Turned of by bcr.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.UseHeadLook
member.summary: Sets the UseHeadLook setting for this . Use headlook.
member.remarks: Default value = True.

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.UpperBodyFlinchHelper.TurnTowards
member.summary: Sets the TurnTowards setting for this . ve balancer turn Towards, negative balancer turn Away, 0 balancer won't turn. NB.There is a 50% chance that the character will not turn even if this parameter is set to turn.
member.remarks: Default value = 1. Min value = -2. Max value = 2.

member.remarks: Default value = Vector3(0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f).

member.name: P:CitizenFX.FiveM.NaturalMotion.YankedHelper.RampTimeFromStartValues
